key_benefits: ['Made from 100% natural cotton', "Rope fibers floss dog's teeth", 'Built strong to chew and play for hours', 'Safe, long lasting great for games, fetch and play', 'Perfect item for teething puppies and strong chewers']
reviews: [I had gotten the small version of this toy for my 4month old beagle and he LOVED it! The only problem was it was short enough that we could really play tug-of-war. Then he killed it about a month later. He was devastated. I tried the Mammoth size and it's HUGE! He was so excited, he drags it everywhere and it's long enough for tug-of-war and he hasn't chewed threw the ball yet. Perfect!, Our girl who we call the annihilator has been enjoying this toy. She likes to chase it, run past it then maybe eventually bring it back(she is not the the best at fetch)! What she does do though is carry it around and chews it...it has lasted so far. So in all seriousness, when this toy finally gives out(which is not for a while yet by the looks of it), we'll be getting her another one., I am trying to get my mini aussie agility dog to tug and thought this would help because she adores chasing yellow tennnis balls. We are still working on it. She's interested in the ball portion, but we have not conquered tugging yet. Maybe it should be a little longer? Great idea though!, Arlo is a bull terrier mix- 1 yo- 50 lbs- heavy chewer. In one hour he peeled all of the fuzz off and split the ball (which was smaller than I expected). He then was able to bite thru the rope’s knot. Destroying toys brings him joy, so under careful supervision I let him have at it. On to the next one.., My husky carries hers everywhere! She loves playing with this rope toy and it keeps her distracted from trying to destroy other things. She even sleeps with it!, Nice toy. Our German Shepherd mix always has a good Time with her tough mammoth toys!, Great choice for my Aussie and GSD. They are tough on Toys., Tennis ball appropriate size for a St. Bernard dog however attached rope good size, Would have given a 5, but the puppies appeared to like your other “spider like” toy a little better., Great toy! Keeps my german shepherds busy and out of trouble. Great toy for the cost would definitely recommend Great for play time and to play tug]

title: West Paw Echo Collection Zwig Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Help your furry best friend spend her boundless reserves of energy with West Paw Echo Collection Swig Dog Toy. Built from the same tough material as the classic Zogoflex and Zogoflex Air, the Swig dog toy is lighter due to its hollow construction, yet durable due to its pliable material. Much more exciting than a wooden stick, this toy has a twist that's perfect for fetching and it floats so your dog can have a splashing good time.This toy is also super bouncy and comes available in multiple colors to fit your pals paw-sonality.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by West Paw
']
key_benefits: ['Soft and hollow construction is easy on teeth.', 'Waterproof toy is safer than a wooden stick and has a twist that makes it perfect for doggies who love to fetch and play in the water.', 'Measures to 13 ¾ inches long, providing your pup with plenty of space to put his mouth as he fetches.', "Durable and pliable material bends with compression, so it's easy on your pal's mouth.", 'American-made dog toy is backed with West Paw’s exclusive Love It Guarantee.']
reviews: [My dog and my neighbor dog - who comes over almost daily for a playdate with my dog - love this toy. I bring a few special toys out, and each time my neighbor dog comes by he grabs various toys - mainly any West Paw toys I have laying on the ground in my yard, then he and my dog begin a game of chase/keep away with each other. It is hilarious, and my neighbor dog always tries taking the West Paw toys with him when it's time to go home. My dog really enjoys playing fetch, tug, and keep away with this toy, among others from this brand. I like that they have different styles based on their chewing habits., Maybe I misunderstood the description, I thought would last longer for moderate chewer-it was destroyed the same day it was given to our dog. I will only purchase for extremely aggressive chewer from now on., I have a 1 year old pit mix and he can chew through anything. I’ve had this toy for almost a year now and it was the best money I’ve ever spent!! He plays tug of war with it every day, sits and chews on it for hours, and it’s great for fetch. Has not broken even with extremely rough play. West paw continues to impress me, but this is by far the best toy they have created! I’ve tried many heavy duty toys and none have compared to this., This toy is my dog’s most favorite toy. He enjoys playing fetch with it, but he is also content to tote it around while walking about the house or just chew on it while lounging. He is an avid chewer, but he is not as hard on toys as my other dog. Both of my dogs are fine with these though, and they hold up well. For reference, both of my dogs are medium build. My male dog is a lab mix, and my female dog is a pitt mix. We have bought other West Paw toys with a lot of success. The first one I purchased was going strong for well over six months until a family member’s golden retriever mix gnawed off one of the ends. My dogs still enjoy that toy though, and it has still held up, even with an end, Avoid this product. Granted, our GSP is a destructive chewer, but he chomped through this is under 30 minutes, leaving us with two ... well, let's just say "rudely suggestive" pieces and leave it at that. It went straight into the trash. Save your money, buy something sturdier., My dog Atticus 3 year old rescue Boston Terrier is an avid Chewer. West Paw is a great brand. It gives him a chew challenge yet doesn’t break apart so no danger of him swallowing it. I think they are a bit pricy, but happy to pay for it considering I don’t have to worry about paying the vet for swallowing rubber pieces! He especially loves the long three knob stick in Purple. His favorite of many!, I only buy West Paw for my dog. She is a ballistic chewer. She loves to play fetch!, Just got this today and so far our Pittie loves it. Seems durable enough for yard play but will continue to monitor to see if it holds up as a chew toy., I bought my first West Paul Pet toy when my pitbull puppies where you’re old. They are now a year and a half and it has lasted through everything they give it. Decided on another., My dog doesn't chew a lot, but when he does he will destroy any toy you give him... except this one. We play fetch & tug games together, or I just let him chew on this when he doesn't want a bone. And, it looks pretty much the same as the day we bought it. I'm buying more West Paw toys in the hopes he'll enjoy them as much without pieces coming off like the do with other brands.]

title: Jolly Pets Romp-n-Roll Dog Toy, Purple
descriptions:
["Good for tug-of-war? Check. Can be fetched? Double check. Fun to chew? Yes, yes, yes!. The Jolly Pets Romp-n-Roll Purple Dog Toy fills every pup's wish list in one versatile toy. The durable, non-toxic polyethylene ball has a rope in the middle of it that makes it easy for you to get in on the game with your fun-lovin' friend. Romp-n-Roll is perfect for multi-pup homes, too!", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jolly Pets
']
key_benefits: ["This ball is made from puncture resistant material that'll withstand heavy chewers.", 'Interactive toy great for multi-pet families that like to play tug-o-war.', 'Made of non-toxic materials so you can be confident in giving this to any furry friend.', "Comforting toy to chew, tug, toss, and even for water activities at the beach, lake, or pool. If punctured it'll still float so your pet can continue to play all day long.", 'Available in multiple sizes so you can pick the perfect one for you pup.']
reviews: [These hold up well. The ones from 5 years ago lasted longer, but they last about 1 year. I buy 2, as my dog’s version of “Fetch,” is more “Keep Away.” I tempt him to drop 1 while waving the other! More training needed, but a great toy., My dogs never play with this toy. The second my dog went to pick it up, the rope fell out., I've bought this particular toy for my tug-o-war lovin' dogs many times and it's usually held up pretty well considering the energy my one particular dog puts into trying to destroy it. Unfortunately, just a day after a bought a new one, the dogs were playing tug-o-war and the rope pulled out because the knot was not big enough. Now I'm left with a ball that is incredibly hard to play with and a rope that the dogs have minimal interest in. This has happened before but not so shortly after receiving it! Why can't they make the knots a little more substantial so that this doesn't happen? I've tried to shove it back through but it's very difficult and it's near impossible to undo and then re-do , My girl loves rhe Romp n Roll but only wants the 4.5 size. I think she likes to carry it in her mouth and can't do that with the bigger sizes which would seem to be more appropriate for a bigger dog., I bought this toy for my 1 year old Rottweiler (~80 pounds). She loves regular Jolly Balls, but after a couple of weeks of play would rip the handles off of them from swinging them around. This version of the toy is great in that it has a rope through it that she can use to swing the ball around instead of an attached handle that can break off. The ball itself is much more rigid than a straight Jolly Ball, and feels a little heavier, but that doesn't stop her from whipping it around. Highly recommend for larger, strong dogs who like a good game of tug or for dogs who like to roughhouse with big toys., I have an ACD that loves to destroy toys. This toy is definitely his favorite. Thank goodness it can withstand his chewing and he grabs the rope to sling it back and forth. I have to reinforce the knots or with his play he will pull the rope through the ball. He will retrieve it all day just to have it thrown or kicked just so he can chase it., My 9 month old English Mastiff has torn apart every toy including his three Kong toys. I have used larger Jolly Balls for my horses, so I decided to purchase one for Henry. He loves it! It has proven to be indestructible. This was definitely money well spent., My puppy will sit and pull the rope from one side to the other over and over. She loves it!, I like the jolly balls with the hard handle better. My dog chews the rope, Our initial purchase was the larger red Romp-n-roll which our 71 pound lab mix absolutely loves. It stays outside as it is larger. He loves to run with it and swing it around. It's very entertaining for him. We purchased the purple one and it stays indoors. It's the perfect size and he loves it as much as the red one. It does not deflate even with tiny puncture holes and the rope has held up incredibly well. Would purchase either again.]

title: West Paw Zogoflex Bumi Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Būmi adds a fun twist to fetch and tug-o-war with an innovative “S” shape that flexes out to twice its length. In addition to helping dogs get a great work out, the floatable active toy exercises dogs’ sense of fun — making it a great companion for any trip to the yard, park or water. Būmi's design makes the toy fly far and is easy for dogs to carry in their mouths.\xa0", 'Būmi is available in two sizes and bright colors for easy spotting in water, grass or snow.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by West Paw
']
key_benefits: ['Būmi play toy is built for tug-o-war standoffs and far-flung fetch sessions, flexes to 2x its length and comes in an easy to grab "S" shape', 'Zogoflex® is an exclusive material that makes fetch, tug-o-war, and chew therapy more fun — it’s easy on doggie mouths, stretches (without stretching out) and sports an unstoppable bounce — all while staying tenaciously tough. For dogs who love to swim (or just need a distraction in the bathtub), Zogoflex stays afloat.', '100% recyclable, BPA-and-phthalate-free, non-toxic, and FDA-compliant', 'It’s easy to sanitize Zogoflex toys at home — just pop it on the top shelf of your dishwasher.', 'Made in Montana from US-sourced materials']
reviews: [I use to receive monthly super chewer toys for my Lola but they were always the same shape and she was getting bored, plus it was getting pricey. Then I found West Paw toys. Chewy saves me a lot of money because I choose the toy. West Paws are perfect for my super chewer, We bought this for our 4-month-old lab/hound mix pup a year ago. She was able to destroy any other cloth style pull toys, so we were anxious to see what she would do with this toy. She would take it to her then 7yo Aussie mix "big sis" to play. In the year we've had this toy, our two fur kids take it out to play tug-of-war and Riv (the pup) brings it in for inside tug-of-war with us. It is just now beginning to show signs of wear. Will buy another one when the current toy wears out., Andre LOVES this to play fetch & as a chew toy; he gnawed through one end in short order. It is too flimsy for tugging but good weight for fetch. After the first bite was chewed off, we sliced through to get clean edge—extended the life of the toy. 2 weeks later it is about 1/2 the size. Requires close attention!!, Winter loves this toy and carries it around everywhere. It’s very durable so she can chew on it all day and it holds up. My dog is a very heavy chewer and I can never find anything that she cannot tear through. Love this toy!!, Our 75+ lb pit bull loves, loves, loves this toy. It has become one of his top two toys to play with. It is strong, resists his biting, and its shape is endlessly fascinating to our baby., My dogs love to play with this together and it’s great for teething puppies., My dog loves this toy. He likes to play tug-of-war with it. He also chews on it. It is soft enough for him to chew, but it shows no signs of wear at all. Recommended for tough chewers., This toy is on all of these lists for the best durable toys, but I bought it for my 6 month old Weimaraner puppy and she destroyed it in about 1 minute. Disappointed but I think it’s better for older dogs that are not chewers, USA made I LOVE it! Big enough for two large dogs to play tug, other than balls their favorite thing to do!, I have 2 GSD one yr olds. I’ve had this toy for 3 days. Cracked and torn in 3 places. Not very happy with this toy]

title: QT Dog Buffalo Tugz Water Buffalo Tough Tug & Chew Dog Toy, 12-in
descriptions:
["Enjoy an exciting game of tug-o-war with this QT Dog Buffalo Tugz Water Buffalo Tug & Chew Dog Toy! This QT Dog product combines the pure joy of a toy and a treat into one exciting creation that your pup is sure to love! Made with 100% water buffalo horn and a strong cotton rope knotted at the ends for added grip, this toy keeps teeth and gums healthy and your pal busy. While he enjoys chewing to his heart's content, you can be happy knowing that every QT Dog product is inspected at every step to ensure quality and safety. Give your pup a treat you both can feel good about!", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by QT Dog
']
key_benefits: ['100% water buffalo horn and cotton rope combine the best of both worlds by providing your pal with a treat and a toy that he’s sure enjoy.', 'Promotes healthy teeth, gums and overall dental hygiene as your pal chews and gnaws on the rope and horn.', 'Cotton rope is knotted at both ends for added grip, making this toy and treat combination suitable for even the most aggressive tuggers and chewers.', 'Water buffalo horn provides a great natural source of essential minerals without additives or preservatives.', 'Every QT Dog treat is inspected at every step to ensure the quality and safety for your canine companion.']
reviews: [I have an 8 month old golden. He smelled the horns and would not go near it. He is a very aggressive chewer so I got the big one thinking it would last awhile. Within 45 minutes ( after he decided it was ok) he was thru the rope. There was string everywhere. I gave it a 3 star and a recommendation because he loves the horns and they keeps him busy for hours., My 6 monhnold German shepherd mix tore through the rope to get the horn off in under 5 minutes. She is still chewing on the horn and likes pulling the longer half of the rope, but it is already broken and JUST arrived., I have 2 Pomeranians and a Lab mix, everyone loves this toy/bone. I’ll have to buy 2 more since they’re not good at sharing.., My American Bulldog/Pitmix is a senior and doesn’t chew for very long. This toy really holds his attention and he loves it but it has already lasted longer than any of his other toys because it’s well built for a dog his age. I’d recommend for a moderate chewer or senior dog, As soon as the rope was delivered my pup and I played with it. Within 30 minutes she had torn through the rope and taken the buffalo bit off of the rope. She's a strong chewer, so was hoping this would be tough and durable for her... The rope is no longer usable. Super disappointment this didn't work out., My mom ordered this for me, I am a 1 yr old Pittie. It lasted less than 5 minutes. My power jaws thought he rope was cute but it worked better for floss when mom tried to get it out my teefs. I love dem horns so I ate it - it was fun but needed to be pibble approved, This tot lasted 10 minutes. Good idea. Cheap rope. 7 month old lab chewed through it like a k ire through butter in literally 10 minutes. I’ll buy some decent rope and restring it for them, It lasted about 4 days. 4 days is acutually good for my 2 dogs. They had a blast while it lasted., English bulldog puppy loves this toy. She did manage to get the horn off the rope, but it still keeps her busy., My poodle chewed through the rope part after playing with it for 20 minutes. Poor quality.]

title: ZippyPaws Monkey RopeTugz Plush & Rope Dog Toy, Red
descriptions:
['Tug of war just got a lot more playful with ZippyPaws Monkey RopeTugz Plush & Rope Dog Toy, featuring durable 2/3-inch thick rope — the same kind of tested rope used by mountain climbers. This extra-tough rope you can withstand hours of tugging and play. It is strong enough for any sized dog, including larger dogs.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by ZippyPaws
']
key_benefits: ['Fun tug-of-war toy.', 'Great for interactive play.', 'Long-lasting made from super durable 2/3-inch thick rope — the same kind of tested rope used by mountain climbers.', 'Fun squeak!', 'Stuffed monkey design with little numbs throughout to help with teeth and gums.']
reviews: [The first thing that happened was the squeeker broke. It was sad since he liked the squeek. It is a good tug toy., I love this toy as the ropes are soft to the touch so no rope burn. It is easy to throw and pull for this disabled gal and my C’Zar loves it too! And when can you honestly say your pup has a monkey on his back., A toy that lasts more than hours. This has lasted about a month in the past and expect this one to be the same. Great interactive toy and toy to play by itself., My adolescent boxer Nola LOVES this toy. Nothing I’ve found that’s not entirely made of rubber lasts long with her, though. It remained in tact for a day with the exception of the ears, which are always the first to go. After a couple days she’d managed to chew through the rope and yank out all the string inside. By one week she’d torn off the face and pulled out all the stuffing. It’s now a jumble of knotted string with some sections of monkey carcass in the middle. But it still has some loop of rope in tact at each end and she loves playing tug with it so we’re gonna try to milk it a bit longer. My sister’s dog has had this toy for months and it’s doing fine, so clearly it’s just not, We bought the initial tug of war monkey when we brought Joe home at 8 weeks. He took his time shredding the wrap on the handles and it lasted 4 months. With a big doodle that’s amazing. Just replaced it and he is so happy to have his monkey back. He dumps it on our lap all night asking for us to play. Strong, affordable and longlasting, I thought it would be a nice change to a tug toy but she had it apart and stuffing coming out in less then 30 minutes., Body of toy doesn't seem like it will stand up to very active dogs chewing or pulling on it., For tugging it's great but keep an eye on the toy as some areas don't hold up very well. We've had it almost a week and our lab puppy ripped the nose open and pulled out the stuffing., My pup really enjoys this toy. It s nice and long and makes it easy for him to be at one end and me at the other so we can play tug. very sturdy, This is the third time we're ordering this. It's fun for the dog, and is very strong and robust, and lasts a long time. Very well designed and built!]

title: Chuckit! Floppy Tug Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
['The Chuckit! Floppy Tug Dog toy is more than meets your pup’s cute little eye. Unwind it and it can serve as an innovative tug for you and your four-legged friend to play with. Your neighbors pup can even join in on the fun for a three-way game of Tug-O-War. This rubber loop of fun is heavy enough to be thrown and tossed long distances for a game of fetch and also twists into different shapes to make sure Skip is never bored!', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Chuckit!
']
key_benefits: ['Designed for exceptional performance.', 'Floppy nature lets dogs shake and thrash which is natural by nature for canines.', "Made of soft but durable material that's easy on a dog's mouth.", 'Distinctive shape is visually interesting to dogs.', 'Coiled spring shape expands and contracts when tugging.']
reviews: [My 5 yr old Doberman loves this thing - even once it has broken into 2 pieces. We’ve had 2 of these in about 4 years time. It breaks where the coil is thinner, but she still loves to play with this toy. It’s a great tug toy before it breaks and once it breaks she loves to fling it around., I have bought around 15 of these over the course of just under 2 years. My dog Mookie absolutely loves this toy for tugging. We have used both the large and small. Mookie is hound/boxer mix, 75 lbs and energy on top of energy. The thin part of the rubber seems very susceptible to weathering which makes cracking and ripping very easy., The toy is heavier than I anticipated and is not appealing to my dog or her playmates and she and they are over 50#, Most other Chuckit products labeled petite/small are perfect for my little min-pin/Chihuahua mix. This toy was WAY bigger than expected. The toy is about as big as his torso., I was buying toys for a little dog but this was on the page so I had no idea it was so big, I bought this items about 8 months ago, but my dogs just "discovered" it last month or so. It's their new favorite toy! All 3 of my girls can grab onto it, run around, chase eachother with it, and play 3-way tug-o-war. My basset especially likes to pick it up and shake the heck out of it. One concern- when this toy stretches out, it can (and has) gotten wrapped around my dogs necks. It's big enough that it can wrap/twist around not just one dog's neck, but two or more. I could see this being a huge safety issue. Due to this, my dogs only play with this toy when they're strictly supervised., My yellow lab & her Rottweiler buddy LOVE to tug with each other! This toy is perfect for their rough play! I ordered one for each of them. I HIGHLY recommend it!, My labradoodle loves to play tug with this toy. It's floppy and durable and so far shows no sign of impact from his teeth!, I had high hopes for this. My dog loved it, and it was neat that it kind of sprung around. However, if you have a heavy chewer, this isn't for you. My 14 pound Shitzu/Poodle had this thing in pieces the same day he got it. If your dog isn't a super-chewer, this is a cool toy., He just looked at it like ugh. It’s plastic. I conclude most dogs prefer rope pulls.]

title: USA-K9 Magnum Skull Treat Dispensing Tough Dog Chew Toy, Black, Large
descriptions:
["The Magnum Skull Treat Dispenser Dog Chew Toy is a bone-a-fide favorite for pups who are known to be heavy chewers. With the added rope at the top of the fun skull design, you can easily stay in control during training sessions. Fill it with your best bud's tastiest goodies, then cover the opening with peanut butter for an extra treat. Constructed from a non-toxic and biodegradable Magnum power chewer rubber compound, this fun toy can hold its own against your pup's heavy chewing. It's also especially easy to clean—simply toss it in your dishwasher!", '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by USA-K9
']
key_benefits: ['The rope on this skull-shaped dog toy makes training, fetching and tugging with your pup more enjoyable.', "It’s made of a Magnum power chewer rubber compound so your best bud's heavy chewing won’t be the death of this toy.", "It's dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.", 'Constructed from an all-natural rubber compound that is FDA compliant, non-toxic and biodegradable.', 'Proudly made in the USA.']
reviews: [Not only did we get our delivery 14 hours after ordering, but this toy is a HIT. Our puppy is 19 weeks old and can be very destructive. This toy is perfect for tug and fetch AND it keeps him independently entertained. My ONLY complaint is that the rope is not very durable at all. After 24 hours it’s nearly severed. We will definitely be keeping the rubber part though!, I bought this for my eight month old lab. He shredded the rope within ten minutes. He does seem to like the skull and it seems durable. Only time will tell., My Akita is hard on toys but this one stood up to his huge jaws and playing! He loves to carry it around and it’s his new favorite. Highly recommend., My 18 mo. Vizsla chews through most toys within minutes after he gets them. This toy has become his favorite. I like the rope and use it to throw the toy. 6 weeks after receiving it and it’s still going strong., We have a Belgian Malinois and he is only 1 year old. He is a very aggressive chewer! Toys usually don't last very long, but I have been impressed with this one. However, the rope didn't stay attached longer than the first hour, he loves the toy. It is a little bouncy so when he drops it he gets excited to chase it. I would purchase more toys from this brand. So far we are very pleased.]

title: Big Sky Antler Chews Natural Elk Antler Rope Dog Chew Toy
descriptions:
['Big Sky Antler Rope Toys combines a treat and a toy for hours of fun — combining a section of elk antler attached to a 100% cotton rope with a knot at each end. Elk antlers provide great taste and health benefits for dogs. The cotton rope toy works like floss to keep teeth and gums clean. The antler is rugged and long lasting, holding up the most vigorous chewer. Remember to always supervise your pet while using antler treats.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Big Sky Antler Chews
']
key_benefits: ['Elk antler is a natural source of essential minerals such as calcium, glucosamine, iron & potassium', 'Elk antler supports bone, joint and muscle health', 'Elk antler aids in kidney function & improved wound healing', 'The cotton rope toy works like floss to keep teeth and gums clean', 'Combines a section of elk antler attached to a 100% cotton rope with a knot at each end']
reviews: [Hi there, my name is Cedar! I am a mini Australian Shepard and just turned four months old. I have had this toy for a while now and it has held up to my little chews. The antler is by far my favorite part of this toy. The rope makes it easy for mommy to play with me or the antler keeps me pretty occupied while she’s doing dishes of folding laundry. (:, My puppy loves it. She loves chewing on the antler part of the rope. I do find strands of string all over where she had pulled them out but guess it is to be expected with a tough chewer., My dog got diarrhea when we bought him a plain antler at a local pet store. Not with this rope and antler. He gets it after breakfast and really enjoys it. No diarrhea., My lab had the antler off the rope when it basically shattered apart in less than 10 minutes, typical rope wouldn’t buy again., We have goldens, and they loved this toy. Chewy came through in a time in need with the covid 19. No bored dogs in this house!!, Great product my puppy loves it. BUT come to find out it’s not for puppy’s as they could break their teeth. I will set it aside for when my puppy gets her adult teeth!, I chose this because it is a great toy and last so well, First night my little girl had it she knawed on the antler for almost an hour. She hasn't been very interested since, but she is not really interested in any toys. I like that she could knaw on the antler while holding the rope or can chew on the rope instead., Perfect for keona......she loves chewing on it and playing with it., I thought this might last longer than the other toys we have purchase for our Labradoddle. However, it didn't make it 2 days before it was shredded to pieces and in the trash. Will not order again.]

title: Pet Qwerks Pickle Fetch Rope Tough Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your one-of-a-kind dog a one-of-a-kind toy with Pet Qwerks’ Pickle Fetch Rope toy. The extraordinary design features a rope that’s perfect for a game of tug and toss and a pickle with a squeaker inside for added fun. It serves as a great way to keep your canine companion engaged and free of boredom. Best of all, the pickle is made from thermoplastic rubber (TPR) allowing it to float. That means you and your dog can keep the fun going in the pool, at the lake or even at the beach! So, keep your dog’s toy collection unique and exciting with this pickle fetch toy.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Pet Qwerks
']
key_benefits: ['This Pet Qwerks toy is great for plenty of interactive play with your dog.', 'Designed with a squeaker to excite and entice your pup.', 'This toy is perfect for an exciting game of toss and fetch.', 'The pickle is designed with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) that floats for extra fun by the pool, at the lake or at the beach!', 'Safe and suitable for canine companions of all ages.']
reviews: [This was the first toy we gave our Belgian Malinois puppy when we were bringing her home. It’s great. The rope is soft for her mouth and long enough for me to stand while playing (although I’m pretty short). The pickle makes a great handle for me and I’m sure she will enjoy biting it in the future when she gets bigger. As a side note, I never leave her unsupervised with this toy. I noticed the strings were pretty easy for her to pull loose if she sat and chewed on it. Still a great toy and if the rope wears out we can still use the pickle in the future., This product came up as a heavy chewer tug toy. My 10 month old destroyed it in less than 90 minutes. He and his sisters didn't even get a chance to tug with it., Not a great toy for tug of war. Played with it twice and the rope popped out of the pickle. So now we just have a pickle and a separate rope., The rope was chewed off the 1st day, but my dog still plays with the pickle a lot., I have a one year old Aussie, girl, 35 pounds . She destroyed the pickle within 30 minutes of its arrival. Don’t bother purchasing unless your pooch has no teeth., This is our dog’s favorite toy! We bought it specifically for playing fetch in the water. He’s 30 lbs and sometimes has trouble holding onto something the size of a tennis ball. He can grab onto the pickle or the rope and it’s easy for him to retrieve. He loves just chewing and playing with it inside too., My dog likes this toy a lot and I get a kick out of it too. Haven't tested if it really does float yet but we are excited to have another lake toy!, My beagle loves this toy!! The pickle came off the rope after the second day of playing, but he still loves the pickle part. He chewed off the squeaky part, and still plays with the rest of the pickle. I purchased this toy in a bundle with other toys. Not sure I would pay $9.99 for the pickle alone., Thought this would be the perfect toy for my 45 lbs, 2 yr old aussie. Nope, he just tore the rope out of it. Now its just the pickle lol he still likes playing with it, but its no longer the tug of war toy we were hoping for.]

title: Chuckit! Mountain Rope Tug Tough Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your furry friend a tough game of tug-o-war with the Chuckit! Mountain Rope Tug Dog Toy. This toy features a unique design as it is made from poly-rope with TPR connectors to withstand rough play. It also features looped ends to provide you and your pup an easy place to grip. Chuckit! Mountain Rope Tug Toy is great for multi-dog households and the perfect way to enjoy some interactive fun with your paw-tner.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Chuckit!
']
key_benefits: ['Interactive tug toy made to withstand a tough game of tug-o-war.', 'Unique design features poly-rope with TPR connectors for durability.', 'Looped ends provide you and your pup an easy place to grip.', 'Ideal for multi-dog households for shared playing.', 'Great for indoor or outdoor play with your furry friend.']
reviews: [my big puppy (85 plus pounds) really likes playing tug with this toy. I"m not sure how long it will hold up to her very hard pulling but it is a good size for her and she will have fun with it till she breaks it. It is pretty strong but definitely not indestructible. I will buy another one after this one succumbs to her intense play style., My Labrador is terrible on toys ! This rope I have to put up bc he gets too excited with it wanting to sling it around inside ( it’s an “outside “ toy !) but he almost hyperventilates whe I pull it down ! I’ve had this literally 4 years ( taking pictures to show how little wear!), WE have CHUCKIT balls and my great dane and mastiff puppy love them, so I thought I was making a good choice with this tug toy. I am now throwing a fairly expensive toy in the trash within 12 hours. The pup chewed thru the plastic and the rope is coming apart., This toy does have a long rope for tug of war. It will not hold up if your dog is a chewer. This only lasted 2 days before the dog chewed thru the rope., Great for tug of war, but definitely would not recommend leaving a puppy/dog alone to chew on, since it will come apart., Our dogs love to tug at this rope. They are both labs and this rope gets quite a workout., Cool idea for a product, but construction was pretty poor. Chewed it up in a matter of a couple days., My 7 month old English Setter destroyed the rubber and rope in an hour. Not worth the money., 70lb pittie mix pup freaking loves this thing. He loved to tug. He will sit in front of the closet we keep it in waiting for me to get it out. That being said we do that to keep it put away definitely not something to leave out with the super chewers. Its kinda starting to fall apart already from all the pulling and one of the orange pieces has slide completely off from holding on to it. I'd say it's not worth the $12 if its just gonna fall apart in I'd say a month or so. Weve had it for about two and a half weeks at this point and play with it every other day for a good 20 minutes., Great dog toy. My dog and I get a lot of exercise.]

title: Nerf Dog Tire Infinity Tuff Tug Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your energetic pal a durable toy optimized for extra-tough tugging and roughhousing with the Nerf Dog Tire Infinity Tuff Tug Dog Toy. Thanks to its unique design, the durable rubber body is perfect for action-packed games of tug your pal can enjoy with you, or with other friendly pups. It’s built with high-performance rubber to stand up to extended rounds of fetch and tugging, so it’s the go-to toy for active pups. When it’s time to relax and store the toy, cleaning doggie drool and dirt is a cinch by just hand washing or wiping away. Plus, it has an ultra-grip tire tread texture that makes it easier for you and your dog to grip.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Nerf Dog
']
key_benefits: ['Perfect for a game of tug of war for pets and pet parents with active lifestyles and to keep your dog interested in the game.', 'The red tire is built to stand up to extra tough play with high-performance rubber for action-packed fun.', 'The excellent quality of Nerf dog toys is made to last, making this lightweight, tough and strong toy one that he will have for years to come.', 'The ultra-grip tire tread texture and unique design makes it simple for you and your dog to handle.', 'Made for medium to extra-large-sized breeds of all life stages, plus it’s easy to keep doggie drool free—simply hand wash it with a mild soap or wipe it clean.']
reviews: [My dog is tough on toys. I thought this would be more durable like a tire and withstand her destructive capabilities. Unfortunately, it did not withstand her tough chewing capabilities. It has still held its shape, but she has been able to chew chunks of rubber off of it., This item is named “infinity tough “. We received this in our shipment and I gave it to my dog to play with. Within 1/2 hr it was in pieces all over my floor. What a waste of money. If I could give negative stars I would., May be a great toy for tuggers, but if they chew also not good. My dog “ate” the pieces off the edges and it’s now trash... less than 10 minutes after giving the toy ( 25 lb mini Aussie), My fur grandson destroyed this in one day. He is a one year old German Shepard mix. I just thought this would last more than one day, My dog was around 46 pounds when I bought this. He has a string jaw but it was too bulky and heavy for him to pick up and carry. I also thought this would be better for tug than the ropes because he just ends of destroying the rope. It’s a quality toy just better for bigger dogs., Hey two dogs love this. It’s the only toy that can’t rip apart and it’s super durable, Dog chewed this up in minutes. Do not waste your money., Dogs loved it n they both can play its holding up to two pitbulls.They play tug, This item works great with my dog. She is having fun pulling and tugging...and it is holding up., We have an English bulldog and a Great Dane. I was hesitant to purchase this because of the reviews but took a chance anyway. Glad I did because it's holding up well. No issues. No tearing or pieces breaking off despite our aggressive tuggers.]

title: Gnawsome Durable Crinkle Stick Dog Toy, Color Varies, 12-in
descriptions:
['Stimulate all of your pup’s senses with the Gnawsome Durable Crinkle Stick Dog Toy. It features a unique spiky texture that is durable and massages your furry friend’s gums. This multi-textured toy has crinkle paper in the middle to keep your paw-tner entertained and is stuffed to add some extra fun. It is also made of BPA-free, food-grade TPR rubber for safety. Ideal for a game of fetch or other rough play, Gnawsome Durable Crinkle Stick Dog Toy provides you and your companion with hours of interactive bonding that you both will enjoy.', '

                        See all items by Gnawsome
']
key_benefits: ['Durable stick toy that features multiple textures to attract and entertain your pup.', 'Massages your pup’s gums with a unique spiky texture.', 'Includes crinkle paper on the inside with stuffing for added fun.', 'Made of BPA-free, food-grade TPR rubber for safety.', 'Ideal for a game of fetch or other rough play with your paw-tner.']
reviews: [The plastic on this toy is not very durable - my dog, who is not a particularly heavy chewer, chewed through it in less than 5 minutes. He absolutely loves the toy otherwise, so it's a shame!, this toy came and in a few hours my 7.5 pound chi-yorkie killed it., My puppy loved this toy, but in a few days figured out how to pull the crinkle bag out of the stick, and shredded it. He still chews the stick some without the crinkle bag, but not as much., I have a jackabee and within 1 hour he wrecked it., I gave it 2 stars because he loved it... I gave it 2 stars because it was annihilated in less than an hour. The crinkle cloth in the middle was out in less than 10 minutes and stuffing was everywhere. The outside was in little rubber chunks in less than an hour. I really wanted to love this because he had a blast with it but it is not durable at all., Our 8 mo corgi (20 lbs) loved this immediately out of the box. It is softish rubber with nubs that I think feel good on his gums (he's in his 2nd teething phase, this time with adult teeth). The issue is the insert, made in nylon fabric . The fabric weave is too loose and the seams are at the edge, proving too irresistible to inquiring puppy teeth. He went through the fabric seams in 1 minute! He is a puppy but I'd hardly classify him as a heavy chewer (compared to some). This "blowout" was so sad because he loved the toy but it needed to be taken away because he was about to eat the plastic and batting filling. We've continued to play with the rubber tubing (without the tantalizing sound from, This crinkle stick brings a whole different meaning to playtime. The crinkle material inside makes my dog go crazy!, My toy arrived a couple of days late because it's a popular toy. They needed to restock it. But oh boy, when she got it she loved it. Her goal was to take out the crinkle thing in the middle. After about an hour of she got it out. I put it back in. Now that's the game. Its not going to last long., This toy is great! My dog won’t stop playing with it due to the crinkle sound in the middle! We already love gnawsome toys and this is a great new product in this product line! We will get more of these!!, My English bulldogs tore it apart in two days , it was not very durable]

title: Tuffy's No Stuff Ultimate Tug-O-War Squeaky Plush Dog Toy, Red Paws
descriptions:
["Tuffy's Ultimate Tug-O-War Dog Toy is ideal for playing fetch or tug-o-war with one or multiple dogs. It’s made with four layers of safe, non-toxic fibers including soft fleece, plastic coating, and a double layer of industrial grade luggage material. All four are stitched together multiple times and then protected with webbing material to ensure this toy is just as durable as it is fun. The Ultimate Tug-O-War Dog Toy also has a protective pouch around each of its three squeakers as an added safety measure in the unlikely event your dog gets to the core. This toy is great for indoor use because of its soft exterior, perfect for outdoor use because it floats in water, and easy to clean because it’s machine washable.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', "

                        See all items by Tuffy's
"]
key_benefits: ['Assembled with multiple seams and webbing to make this toy a worthy opponent for most moderate chewers.', 'Made with 3 uniquely fused layers for added durability during play.', 'Contains 7 squeakers sewn into a squeaker safety pocket inside for an added layer of security', 'Floats in water for added fun and machine washable for easy cleaning.', 'Rates a perfect #10 on Tuffy\'s own "Tuff Scale."']
reviews: [My corgi had this toy for 15 minutes while I was in the same room and he ate through the fabric and got the squeaker out.... the tag marketed this toy was made of tough material and good for small dogs who chew a lot... false advertisement, My 11 lb shih tzu absolutely loves this thing. I totally didn't read the dimensions and it is huge for him but he doesn't care and plays with it all day., I have had this time more than a week and it is still fully intact. They all say material is the little fuzzy and it’s a great toy. They prefer the ones that apparently heart. Sleep better because they’re more fun having all that fluff all over my house, but this one is going to last and I definitely use it. They just get frustrated that they can’t rip it apart and go on to another toy That they can destroy., We usually get the regular stuffed toys. My dog unstuffed every one - so I tried this. He loved the other ones. Walked around with it in his mouth begging you to play. With this version it just lays on the ground and we have to engage him. I think it’s because there is no substance to it so he has trouble getting a good grip with his mouth or at least he thinks he does!, The dogs like the toy but it’s hard for them to grab on to, This toy lasted about 15 minutes.. My CBR chewed until she got one of the squeakers out... so my 15.00 was wasted!, My 2 70 pound rough and tuff girls play tug with this toy and it’s still in one piece, My pitbull and my shepard love it. The toy is still intact. Others toys last about ten minutes with these two., Very disappointed with this toy. Did not realize Tuffy made one with no stuffing .Dog not interested in it at all, Leo loves to play tug-of-war and this toy keeps your hands safe from accidental bites. It’s also chew-proof.]

title: Hyper Pet Disney Alien Super Squeaker Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Your furry friend is going to love playing with his new Hyper Pet Disney Alien Super Squeaker Dog Toy! This soft toy is made of stuffed latex for a satisfying texture your pup won’t be able to resist. It’s paw-fect for tossing, fetching, catching and chasing and to really keep the fun going, it has a loud squeaker inside! And if you find the Alien outside covered in mud, all you have to do is wipe it with mild soap and water before your paw-tner tries to bring it back inside!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Hyper Pet
']
key_benefits: ['Contains a loud squeaker to excite your pup.', 'The soft latex material is easy on teeth.', 'Easy to clean—simply wipe with mild soap and water.', 'Looks just like the Aliens from the Toy Story movies.', 'Paw-fect for a game of fetch or catch—not intended for aggressive chewers.']
reviews: [Our dog had this toy torn apart 5 min. after it arrived. We bought two Aliens, one for our dog and one as a replacement for the Alien she took from our son's girlfriend's dog. The Alien toy is very desirable to dogs, as this is a favorite toy, and it was the object of many failed attempts by our dog to take it home! We are confused as to why the OLD Alien toy lasted 6 months (purchased for Christmas 2019 and played with non-stop) and the one we received was able to be torn apart in 5 min? Did the quality of the product change?, Mini Aussie pup loves squeaky toys, but no interest in this. It's pretty big and "farts", not a honk or squeak. Will have to see if friends new pup likes it., This toy only lasted about 2 hours! So cute and the funniest squeaker, really wished it was better quality!, Would give 0 stars if I could. My 9 week old puppy broke it, within 3 days of its arrival. He didn’t chew a hole in it, it broke with him just nosing and squeezing it to make it “honk”, This was our favorite squeaky toy, but it is not recommended for bigger dogs because it was destroyed in 2 days., My dog loved this toy. It is a large but soft rubber and the whole thing makes a honking noise easily. At first she tried to take out the squeaker which is easy to get out., For some reason I was thinking this was going to be too small for my 110 pound pup- it was in his Christmas stocking and he loved it!! He literally spent all morning squeaking it and throwing it around! Great buy!, My dog usually loves those honking pigs but I bought this and it is her absolute favorite squeaky toy she babies this toy, she even sleeps with it. I might have to buy another one for later., The sqeaker broke and started to pop out of the toy with in the second day. Its such a shame because my dog really loved this toy., I bought two of the alien and also the pig. It’s been over a week and surprisingly they still Squeek. My Boston terriers usually destroy every squeeky toy within minutes, but this one has captivated them. It gives off more of a deeper honk, versus a Squeek. Please note, this toy is flimsy and it CAN be destroyed easily, if your pup decides to. Because of this, I do wish they were a few dollars cheaper. Because it’s a Disney character it’s gonna cost extra.]

title: Chuckit! Rope Fetch Dog Toy, One Size
descriptions:
['There’s always more than one way to play, especially with the Chuckit! Rope Fetch Dog Toy! It’s made from a durable polyester oxford material and has a rope wrapped around the center. To transform it from a ball to a tug toy, simply unwrap the rope and use the handle to tug or toss! And since the colors are so vibrant, your dog won’t have any trouble retrieving this toy. So, whether your paw-tner prefers to roll, kick, catch or tug, the Chuckit! Rope Fetch Dog Toy is the paw-fect option for her.', '

                        See all items by Chuckit!
']
key_benefits: ['The indentations make it easy for your dog to grip, catch and pick up.', 'Paw-fect for kicking, tugging and throwing.', 'The built-in handle allows you to transform the toy from a ball to a tug toy.', 'Encourages plenty of interactive play and exercise.', 'Designed with bright colors, so your pup can easily find and retrieve the toy.']
reviews: [This ball just really doesn't do anything special. The rope is kinda useless & it's to soft to be a ball u wld play too of war with. Even if your dog is more into fetching like mine. She still prefers a diff ball & wants to chew on the rope which isn't strong enough for that. It has stayed in the top box since the day after it arrived., My dog loves the kick ball that is larger with my no string but we have a contender with this toy. He goes crazy over this,he runs faster for this. Love that we can play with or without the string. I wish it was just a lil bit larger not as large as the kick it ball chuckit makes but just a lil bit. I can only hope they make one that glows as well. This is added along with the kick it ball as a repeat toy to buy., Our german shepard loves these. I wish they lasted longer but he loves to chew on them so it's no wonder., Our lab loves this ball. It must feel good on her teeth/gums because she squeezes it constantly. This is one of the best toys we’ve bought because it doesn’t squeak, yet it’s soft enough to throw in the house when we play., I have a large yellow lab. She loves to tug on toys and chew them. This lasted longer than expected. I liked that you can opt to "hide" the rope or undo., My 4 month old puppy destroyed the pull handle within a half hour. It needs a better quality rope., Chukit soft fetch balls were my dogs' favorites for a long time. The only problem with them is that they are expensive and don't last long for the price you pay. This one due to its smaller size seems to be more durable. It survived already more than a week in our house two German Shepheards! Also the rope is handy - you can take it even when you go on short walks with your dog., The rope didn’t hold up as much as I had hoped but my puppy still enjoys batting the ball around., I picked one up at Petsmart and my dog and I love it!!! It’s a tug and a ball! Wish Chuckit! Would make a glow in the dark one! We would totally buy!]

title: Petique Eco Pet Rope & Chew Tough Squeaky Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Petique Eco Pet Durable Rope and Dog Chew Toy is paw-fect for your next game of tug of woof. This 16-and-a-half-inch rope comes complete with fun chew toys included right on the rope itself. Your dog will have a blast running after his new toy after a good toss. Picture him bringing it back with a big smile on his face! He’ll love chewing, tugging and playing with this classic toy wherever he goes. And you’ll love being able to throw it in the washing machine if it ever needs a quick clean-up.', '

                        See all items by Petique
']
key_benefits: ['Designed for durability so the playtime never has to stop!', 'Not just a rope, this toy also has green spiked balls that are great for chewing.', 'Your dog will love the variety of textures between the rope and chew toys.', 'This classic dog toy features fun colors and stripes.', 'Machine washable for easy cleaning, when needed.']
reviews: [I ordered this for my German Shepherd who is a strong chewer. She enjoys the squeaky toys & I thought it would be easier to play tug of war with a rope toy. It DOES NOT SQUEAK so she has little interest in it. The rope seams like good quality but one of the balls tore within 5 min of her chewing on it. She does like chewing on the balls with the extra texture. She would play with it more if it squeaked. PLEASE REMOVE THE WORDING THAT THIS TOY SQUEAKS ON THE LISTING., this is a good toy for dogs who are interested in playing tug and not in eating the toy! It cannot hold up to my big shepherd puppy but another dog would probably love it, I bought this toy for my dog and likes playing with it he loves to chew on the rope and the balls., I did a search explicitly for tough squeeky dog toys. I saw this and i knew my two would love it! HOWEVER IT DOES NOT SQUEEK & IM EXTREMELY DISSAPOINTED., With big dogs, hard to find this type of toy. It's perfect, we can play or they can play with out us. Good toy, As long as your dog is the size of a Cocker Spaniel or smaller, I think this toy will last a while. This toy is fine if you dog doesn't play rough or think his mission in life is to destroy toys. The ball material needs to be more flexible to make it less likely to be torn up. I think the dogs like the pattern and colors tho.]

title: Ethical Pet Play Strong Bone & Rope Tough Dog Chew Toy
descriptions:
['The Play Strong Bone & Rope Dog Toy is a heavy weight, virtually indestructible toy for smaller dogs who happen to be tough chewers. The bone itself is made with super durable and unique rubber that comes with a 100% lifetime guarantee so you can rest assured it will stand up to wear and tear. A rope runs through the center of this toy for added fun and more ways for your pup to play.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Ethical Pet
']
key_benefits: ['Heavy weight toy designed for tough chewers', 'Includes a rope through the center for added fun', 'Bone is thermoplastic rubber (TPR) formulation', 'TPR fuses together elements of plastic and rubber for added durability and bounce', '100% lifetime guarantee (excludes rope)']
reviews: [I have a terrier mix, about 35 lbs. He is the king of destruction when it comes to toys and his bed. I bought this assuming it would soon be destroyed....5 months later and he is still playing with it. Of course he ripped the rope, but the toy itself hasn't been destroyed, This toy last longer than other chew toy for my 7 month puppy. She loves it and it's easy to clean., I'm sure this toy isn't bad but it shouldn't be advertised for a strong chewer, because it didn't last longer than the time it took me to write this review. I don't like to write bad reviews but I feel that this was definitely misleading so if you have a strong chewer, buy something else., The rope was quick to go (day one) however the hard rubbery bone is still lasting! And my 2 boys are 85lbs+ bullies, they show no mercy but its holding up like our Kongs., This toy is great! I have a Boxer mix with a very strong jaw!! This bone looks like new after a week....it may last longer than any other toy we have ever given him!, I purchased the large for my boxer 1 year old who thinks anything plastic or rubber is food. The toys will slowly get digested, evidenced by his colorful poops. Of cause I take the toys away once I notice. Well this toy in large is big and strong enough rubber, he has not even dented the toy in 2 weeks. Maybe the makeup of the rubber material is not appealing to him which is good. My 2 boxers play tug-a-war too and it still looks brand new. I'd like to get the small but it is a lot more money, what's up with that?, Good for those dogs that are hard chewers. Mine is a shi tzu but her teething is very intense. During those crucial times this works!, Tristan my 105 lb shepherd mix loves this toy. He is a power chewer and not a mark on it. I highly recommend this brand., My 1 1/2 year old lab had the rope gone within minutes and within half an hour had chunks of the rubber bone all over the floor. Not as good as advertised., My dog destroys everything she chews on. So far after 2 weeks this has held up good. Everything still intact. I will purchase more of these.]

title: GoDog Rope Tek Figure 8 Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Show your furry friend a fun time with the GoDog Rope Tek Figure 8 Dog Toy. It features Therma-Fuse Technology, which bonds durable, non-toxic polymer to extra strong climbing rope to create a toy that stands up to tough play. This toy is made with environmentally friendly, sustainable and organic materials and Chew Guard Technology to be safe yet strong. This figure 8 is also soft on the gums of your pup for more enjoyable playtime. Ideal for a game of fetch or tug-o-war, GoDog Rope Tek Figure 8 Dog Toy will quickly become your companion’s new favorite plaything.', '

                        See all items by GoDog
']
key_benefits: ['Durable rope toy made with environmentally friendly, sustainable and organic materials.', 'Features Therma-Fuse Technology, which bonds durable, non-toxic polymer to extra strong climbing rope.', 'Soft on the gums of your furry friend for more enjoyable playtime.', 'Made with Chew Guard Technology for durability and dependability.', 'Ideal for a game of fetch or tug-o-war anywhere you take your paw-tner.']
reviews: [I thought if I purchased a heavy durable rubber chew toy it would entertained my Beagle for weeks, as she's a chewer shredder. Oh, well. I didn't get my monies worth, she chewed through "GoDog Rope Tek Figure 8 Dog Toy" within 4 days. I was hoping for a month at the least. By the second day bits a pieces were all over the livingroom floor then the kitchen floor, well you get the picture. Cannot recommend!, Our chocolate lab loves this toy. Must supervise when he plays as he has been able to peel and chew off the edges of the rubber...that's why not a 5 star review. Easy for two big dogs to tug of war or even with one of us., We have a 7 month old 40lb super mutt who loves to chew. He loves this toy. He has not destroyed it like some reviewers noted, but he has started to make some very small cracks in the rubber...almost like tiny rubber shards that may break off. So, to be on the safe side, it’s coming to its end. That said, It’s great for fetch because it’s bouncy and works well as a tug toy. For a month, it’s been worth the cost. Some toys don’t last a day..., I ordered this toy because my dog kept chewing up and swallowing rope toys. This toy is a great alternative because it doesn't have the frayed ends she loves to eat. It also bounces and acts like a ball while still allowing for a great tug of war game., The toy got destroyed sighing a day of my lab mix having it. The rubber started falling off in pieces., My pack loves to play tug with each other, but they shred the traditional stringy rope style tug toys so I thought this would last longer. I was wrong. Didn’t even last a day and the rubber piece was torn off one side., After just 2 minutes of chewing on this.....don’t waste your money.]

title: Pets First NFL Football Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:

key_benefits: ['Durable nylon toy in the shape of a football.', 'Colored rope on either side of the toy gives pet parents a better grip.', 'Squeaker on the inside to keep your furry friend interested.', 'Ideal for a game of fetch or tug-o-war.', 'Officially licensed by the NFL.']
reviews: [I thought this would be our weekly game ball for the season. The material is easily punctured and the seams came apart just playing with it by herself while I watched the game. The rope doesn’t go through the ball; it’s just sewn on both ends. Threw it away after our first game because the stuffing was coming out. Disappointed!, My Sheltie who is just a little guy and not a huge chewer ripped a hole in it in a couple of hours. This was just from playing fetch with it., Toy ripped within a minute of the dogs having it. I would recommend it was a waste of my money. Toy was made very cheap, Don't do it. Definitely not made for active puppies. Material ripped within first 10 minutes of play., This is a cute toy and the "tug of war" aspect is great but if you have an aggressive chewer like we do I would advise against unsupervised play. Brandy, our chocolate Lab was left alone with the football and managed to chew a hole in it in minutes., I love this ball, it's lightweight, and easy while playing catch with my 5 month old chocolate lab puppy. No squeak inside, which can become annoying after a while during playtime. Very durable, and has a few teeth punctures, however the material isn't ripped or any of the filling coming thru (YET)! Dries quickly and rope is twisted and TOUGH!, My 5 1/2 month old puppy who is active and likes to chew shredded the chew toy within 12 hours of receiving it. She chewed the manufacturing label and it caused a small hole in the seem. She than ripped opened the small hole and removed the inside of toy. I I would not recommend this toy for a chewing puppy., This football toy has been great for my two rough and tough Golden Retrievers to fight over! Always looking for durable dog toys that don't fall apart at first bite and this one fits the bill. Bonus NFL logos make it stand out., My 3 month old puppy chewed through the fabric of the football in less than a week and that was while I constantly supervised her with this toy and took it away after a short periods. Each time her teeth would puncture through the fabric, then eventually the stuffing started coming out. I bought this toy because it had ropes that looked durable and weren't frayed. On that note, the ropes were good, which is why I gave 2 stars instead of 1., Bought for my 12 month old mini boxer. He tore it up in about an hour.]

reviews: [our 8 month old Boxer is pretty gentle with her toys, so much so she still has some from when she was 8 weeks old but this toy lasted one day! But I thought he would squeak. Instead it turns out he oinks! Doesn't phase my pup one bit. She loves the pig! I wish I could post a video of her going bonkers playing with the pig. Too funny!, My dog loved this toy. It is a large but soft rubber and the whole thing makes a honking noise easily. At first she tried to take out the squeaker which is easy to get out., My dog just loves this toy. It’s her favorite. I love it cause is durable and keeps her entertained, If I gave this to my labrador retrievers who are heavy chewers this would last about 10 minutes it’s thin, Because the squeaker part sticks out of the stomach, my dog found it in a matter of seconds and popped the tube right out. No more sound. Next came the stuffing. The tube wasnt secured in the hole or anything. Unfortunately did not last long. Do not reccomend., I was really excited to get this toy. My dog loves all things pigs. He loved this toy instantly, but was able to pull the squeaker piece out within an hour. The rest of the toy is super durable and to be honest, the squeaking noise was annoying, so I’m not upset that I had to throw that piece out. Just something to be aware of if you have a chewer., This is the silliest toy. My dog absolutely loves this silly toy. Especially the noise it makes. She is so cute pouncing on it, pushing it with her paws and trying to carry it around. She is a little Chihuahua mix and she is so funny when she plays with this toy. I would recommend this toy. It is worth the money., Like many of the other reviews, I gave this to my dog as a Christmas gift. She was super excited and played with it nonstop. Less than two hours later it was destroyed. She has many toys and this is the only one to have not lasted. Not even a day... what a waste of money.]

title: West Paw Skamp Fetch Dog Toy
descriptions:

reviews: [I was going to leave a 5 star review until I noticed just recently it had split right on the seem. Now I have to throw it away and buy another one. Greycie likes this one more than others so I felt bad taking it away hasn't had it long., This toy does require supervision because it is hollow inside, but it remarkably durable. It has been the most popular toy for dogs in our house and it's easy for dogs to share or to play tug with. This is the best Westpaw product I have found., Love this toy: not only is it durable (and my pup is a notorious toy destroyer, so that’s saying something), but it’s also versatile: great for a game of tug AND it’s easy to throw around for whenever you want to switch to fetch., Typically I love West Paw dog toys. They are durable and last for ages. Not this one. When I unpacked it I was very surprised at how lightweight and flimsy it felt. Unlike the west paw bones which are totally solid, this one is hollow. Of corse the boys (3 yr old chocolate and 4 yr old yellow labs) were out of their minds with excitement. Who wouldn’t be with a new West Paw toy? Why not I thought. Let’s give it a try. Well it took under 15 minutes for my yellow lab to chew the end clean off it at, which point I had to be the mean Mom and take it away. Very disappointed., Love west paw but this one did not survive long. The S shaped tug of war thing and some of the others are indestructible. And I have a dog that can take down a super Kong in seconds!, My high energy 2 year old pitbull has so much fun with this toy. It's the perfect shape for her to hold onto and play with herself. Entertains her for hours. She's has it for months and it doesn't have any signs of wear., I have a lab that is a power chewer and West Paw (and little else) stands up to the test! When this arrived, I was a little nervous since it was lighter weight and seemed less durable than some of the other West Paw products I had previously purchased. I have been really surprised that there is not even one tooth mark in this toy after more than a month of aggressive fetch, tug, and chewing with the toy! I actually like that it’s lighter weight when throwing it around with the dog in the house. It’s my dog’s new favorite toy! It’s also great outside and floats! With Chewy’s great customer service and West Paw guarantee, you can’t go wrong! West paw had replaced for free one toy my dog was able, My dog loves this toy. She will not play with her other rubber toys unless they are one with food in them. This one she searches for out of her toy basket and entertains herself all day long with. The hallow inner makes a squishing this toy fun. She is an avid chewer and will destroy any toy that isn't durable and this toy is holding up so far., I bought this a year or so ago for my pit bull, and he still loves it. When we added a new Rhodesian Ridgeback puppy to our family in July, this was the first toy she grabbed (though it was MUCH too big for her at the time). At 10 months she's now over 75lbs. Both dogs adore this toy. I think it's easy to carry, and it's hollow inside - so they can chew and chew and get a satisfying squish, but they can't chew off pieces of it. The pup likes to flip it up in the air and watch it bounce, then pounces on it. And, even with full-on tug-of-war games between a 70lbs pit bull and a 75lbs rigdeback pup, it still looks perfect. Definitely recommend., Once again West Paw has impressed me. I’ve purchased many of their soft “rowdy” toys and always loved that not only do my dogs love them, but they’re long lasting. Some hard toys either don’t interest my dogs, or break right away, so I’d avoided buying these type west paw toys....boy am I glad I decided to order this one and try it out!!! My 70lb pitbull spent almost an hour trying to chew on this and it still is in PERFECT shape (see picture!!). All 3 of my pups have been playing with this since it arrived. I’ll see how long it lasts, but even lasting 2 days while being constantly chewed on and still in perfect condition is impressive!!! I have high hopes and will definitely be ordering more]

reviews: [Of course Buoy, being a lab, finished it off in about 10 minutes, but his joy was a thing of beauty to see.]

title: Dogit Multicolored 3-Knot Rope Tough Dog Toy, 28-in
descriptions:
['Rope your dog into hours of play with the Dogit Multicolored 3-Knot Rope Dog Toy. This knotted rope toy is just the right length for a tug of war session par excellence! Three knots give pups plenty of ways to get a hold, while the knotted loop at the end gives you an easy grip during play. Great for wrestling, fetch, and fierce chewing, this all-natural cotton fiber toy will keep your lil’ tugger happy for hours.', '

                        See all items by Dogit
']
key_benefits: ['Natural cotton fibers are durable and biodegradable.', 'Twisted rope cleans pups’ teeth as they chew.', 'Handy loop makes it easy to hold while you play with your dog.', 'Redirects destructive chew behaviors.', 'Can be looped around a doorknob for solo play.']
reviews: [The very first day the puppy couldn’t quit playing with it. My husband sits down and with all her toys this is her favorite go to toy with him. The rope is a little big but she finds a way to drag it to him. Would not recommend it for a small dog just to big., Wow! I think I paid 3x this price for a smaller, cheaper rope toy at a pet store. It feels like it should be too good to be true! This rope toy has lasted 2 months in our home with three rough Vizslas (who normally kill toys in a few hours) and washed with bleach 3 times but still looks new. However, it is HUGE! I would not recommend it for a dog under 50lbs. The pictures are of my 40lb Vizsla and this thing is almost as big as her (not that she likes it any less for that!)., My dog loves it. The one he had , he had it so tore up it was leaving string throughout the house. Time for a new one., I like the loop on the end, makes it easier to hang onto when playing tug of war with my Golden., My new puppy loves to chew and chase the toy rope around the house.]
