reviews: [My granddog loves this toy!! It's her favorite of all the wonderful Chewy toys I purchased for her Christmas stocking!, Soft and easy to carry. Our Pearl loves this toy.]

title: West Paw Zogoflex Air Wox Large Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Light, bouncy and soft enough for your dog to catch with his mouth, West Paw Zogoflex Air Wox Large Dog Toy has a durable exterior texture that engages pups for fun games of fetch. Wox features three satisfyingly squishy legs that dogs love to chew. The erratic bounce and surprising shake made by this toy makes it perfect for mentally-stimulating play. Its gentle grip is easy on human hands and canine jaws alike — making it the perfect toy for epic three-way tug-o-war games, and beyond.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by West Paw
']
key_benefits: ['Puncture-resistant toy comes in three bright colors and has three satisfyingly wobbly legs for interactive tug-o-war. The erratic bounce and the surprising shake make this dog toy perfect for mentally stimulating play and is made for tugging, tossing and shaking.', 'Measures 4" tall & 6.5" wide with an air-injected center so this Zogoflex Air floats higher and gets flung further all while providing a satisfying (and durable!) squish', 'It’s easy to sanitize Zogoflex Air at home — just pop it on the top shelf of your dishwasher.', 'Zogoflex Air toys are completely non-toxic, BPA-free, phthalate-free, latex-free and FDA compliant.', '100% recyclable toy is not only eco-friendly but designed, sourced and made in the USA']
reviews: [It is giant and perfect size for my dog. She loves Nylabones because they have the sharp numbs for her to chew; but everyone on my two local buzzes talked about this and how much their dogs loved it. She hates it unless we are pulling on it. I like that it doesn’t hurt my hands if we are playing and I can throw it without worrying if it will break. But she loves her other bones and will go grab that as soon as I stop playing. And this one doesn’t have the numbs that cleans her teeth. My dog has perfect teeth and the vet is always impressed by them. So, I won’t buy this again, but I do think it’s a great product for dogs to play tug-a-war and catch in the house., West Paw are great toys!!! Our dog Molly has a basket full of them that she plays with and carries around to greet everyone! She takes one in the backyard every time she goes out! She is a strong chewer, but she doesn’t chew to destroy them. For her it is for jaw exercising, fetching and carrying. They were recommended by a vet Dentist to replace her beloved tennis balls because the fibers from the tennis balls were causing gum problems. Would highly recommend them!! However, if you have a destructive chewer I would suggest trying one of the sturdier West Paw toys as opposed to one of the more flexible ones., My Newfie’s favorite toy. She loves to play fetch with it and also likes to chew it. It is tough and has lasted more than a year. I just ordered a second one because the first one has a crack in it, but I think a year plus of being loved by a Newfie is pretty good., My 2 dogs (a pittie and a lab mix. Both big power chewers) love this toy. They wrestle with it and cannot defeat it. Keeps them occupied forever. Best purchase!, This didn't even last an hour. Other westpaw products have been great for my pits and this toy literally didn't last an hour from the time it arrived and was taken outta the box to the time it got destroyed. Save yourself the money, West paw toys were recommended so I gave them a try with this toy. Didn't really want to spend $19 on one single toy but figured if it lasted with my chewer it would be worth it. Well.. it lasted all of 5 mins before it cracked and lost a chunk out of the center! My dog loved it up until then but not sure it's worth $19 for 5 mins of fun. My dog and I are pretty disappointed ☹️, Toby loves this new toy. He's a 65 lb boxer-lab mix with powerful jaws. It's great for retrieval and its also tough enough for his chewing and tugging., I have gotten several zoogoflex toys for my very strong German Shepherd chewers. This one was ripped in one day :( I think the weaker points are not as sturdy as some of the others designs from this company. I also feel like the quality of rubber used is not as goor either. I love the company but not this design for strong chewers., Have another dog toy from this brand and it has lasted almost a year so thought this one would be another “tuff” toy that our labradoodle would not destroy. He had it less than two days and had it ripped apart - just didn’t hold up as well. A little disappointed., I was hopeful my dog would be able to play with this toy for a while and keep him entertained. He chewed the entire thing to many pieces in less than 5 mins. I wouldn't have paid the amount I did for a toy that only lasts a few minutes. I was very disappointed.]

title: Nerf Dog Vortex Chain Tug Dog Toy, 25-in
descriptions:
['Take your best friend’s tug-of-war game to the next level with the Nerf Dog Vortex Chain Tug Dog Toy. Featuring bright colors for easy tracking and a durable nylon design, this toy is built to withstand hours of strenuous chewing and pulling. The faceted links of the vortex chain provide a solid grip for his teeth and your hands, so playtime is less slippery and more fun.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Nerf Dog
']
key_benefits: ['Nylon chain-link tug toy for dogs.', 'Suitable for active play.', 'Designed to withstand hours of rough play.', 'Lightweight and portable.', 'Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.']
reviews: [I bought this toy (named Snake) for my 17lb Boston Terrier. It was a sometimes toy. Mostly LilyButt forgot about it, but when she remembered, TUG-TUG-KILL SNAKE was great fun! For months! Then a beautiful, sweet pitbull moved in with us. She found Snake and within a day, all Snake was good for was confetti. It was a tragic demise to a beloved toy, but we've learned an important lesson. Size does, sometimes, matter., We have a heavy chewer who is determined to fully shred any toy. He took out the ball in 20 mins, but the rope has held up for weeks! It expands when tugged on, and only kind of retracts afterwards. It'll never retract the way it came in the mail, but it'll a great tug o war rope!, My golden retriever is 75lbs, she’s a shredder. She had the nerd ball tore off in 15 minutes. The rope however is sturdy., This toy can really be pulled and stretched without ripping or breaking! Stuffed ball on the end is easily ripped open like any stuffed toy. It probably work better with tennis balls on each end. But even without the stuffed ball, The empty bottle can still be cold in that other material and stretch and stretch and stretch. I think they should have something on both ends for the dogs to grab., My dog loved it, but destroyed it in about an hour.]

title: Penn-Plax 3 Knot Tough Dog Rope Toy
descriptions:
['Prepare for canine playtime with the 3 Knot Dog Rope Toy from Penn-Plax! Whether your buddy likes to tug, chase or chew, this 100% cotton toy will stand up to hours of interactive play with your pup. Paw-fect for tug-of-war, this twisted cotton toy comes complete with three tough knots for easy gripping and chewing. Built to last, it’ll provide hours of fun for you and your furry friend—plus the rope fibers can help to keep teeth and gums clean. This toy is available in multiple colors and sizes to fit your pup and it’s completely machine washable for easy cleaning.', '

                        See all items by Penn-Plax
']
key_benefits: ['Encourages interactive and solo play.', 'Satisfies the natural instinct to chew.', 'Woven fibers can help to floss Fido’s teeth and keep his gums healthy.', 'Triple-knot toy—made of super-durable non-toxic cotton rope.', 'Safe to toss in the washing machine when it’s time for a cleaning.']
reviews: [I have a 12 month old black lab. He gets excited when he gets new toys so he was happy when I gave him this rope toy. Alas, it lasted a whole 10 minutes before falling apart in shreds. Little threads everywhere. Have to take it away before dog swallowed all the threads. Depending on your dog this may not be strong enough. Will probably last longer with a little dog, This has been lasting my Plott Hound a while! She enjoys playing tug a war with it and just using it to chew. I like that it has enough chomping space if she creeps up while playing., I have a 10 month old mix Jack Russel and Pug. He's more Jack than anything! He has managed to destroy toys that even my big Boxer couldn't! So far so good :) He loves this rope too!, My puppy is a chewer and this is still around. She is starting to fray the rope., This rope is made very well, tough and holds up very well, she loves it!!, This rope toy is not large, it is enormous! Way too big for my dog!]

Built with ballistic nylon and a tightly-twisted rope, this durable duck is a perfect match for your little buddy who plays tough with his toys. Your pup will enjoy hours of avid chewing, tugging and fetching indoors and out. And when he’s ready for a snooze, the duck doubles as a plush pillow. Get ready, because your dog and duck duo will soon be inseparable!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

key_benefits: ['This durable duck is perfect for your ruff and tuff playmate.', 'Made with ballistic-grade nylon and tightly-twisted rope for long-lasting play.', 'Lightweight design won’t easily tire out your dog during playtime, but doubles as a plush pillow for relaxing naps.', 'Small size is perfect for your proud petite pooch.', 'Stands up to your pup’s desire to chew.']
reviews: [Bought as I thought it would be tough. My dog had this tore to pieces within minutes. If you have a heavy chewy this is not good., My puppies love it, they throw the duck in the air, and catch it. The larger size is great too., Purchased this because the tag says it’s for “aggressive chewers” — lasted two days., My Great Dane got this for his first birthday and he loved it for about 10 minutes. Wish it would’ve lasted longer because he really liked it]

title: Jolly Pets Romp-n-Roll Dog Toy, Orange
descriptions:
["Good for tug-of-war? Check. Can be fetched? Double check. Fun to chew? Yes, yes, yes! The Jolly Pets Romp-n-Roll Purple Dog Toy fills every pup's wish list in one versatile toy. The durable, non-toxic polyethylene ball has a rope in the middle of it that makes it easy for you to get in on the game with your fun-lovin' friend. Romp-n-Roll is perfect for multi-pup homes, too!", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jolly Pets
']
key_benefits: ["This ball is made from puncture resistant material that'll withstand heavy chewers.", 'Interactive toy great for multi-pet families that like to play tug-o-war.', 'Made of non-toxic materials so you can be confident in giving this to any furry friend.', "Comforting toy to chew, tug, toss, and even for water activities at the beach, lake, or pool. If punctured it'll still float so your pet can continue to play all day long.", 'Available in multiple sizes so you can pick the perfect one for you pup.']
reviews: [I have herding breeds, so due to their active nature I look for toys like this to play catch and drop with. This one is perfect because the ball gets just the right amount of bounce when I swing it by the rope, so my dogs go nuts trying to catch it and follow it around. And also because the ball slips to the other side of the rope certain times they’ll just boop the ball and have to keep chasing it, but when they catch the rope we play tug for a bit before they’re instructed to drop it. Once they’re nice and tired, I put it away. My “four stars” is for the rope... I know if I left it out, my dogs would have that shredded after a few chews., This is one of the few toys that my 45 lbs Blue Lacy has not been able to tear up. The ball is made of a hard rubber not plastic. It is weather resistant with a hole through it in case the rope would need replacing. So funny to watch her whirl it over her head like a helicopter. She hasn't let it go while in helicopter mode so that may be a reason for outdoors. She loves it and that is all that matters. Thanks Chewy !, This is still holding up with our aggressive chewers and ball still on rope. They don’t have a lot of interest in it though. Ball may be too big., As the weather warmed up, we bought a few toys for our dog to play with outside. This is, by far, her favorite. She loves to chase the ball, and LOVES to play tug-of-war with it when she brings it back to us. The size was perfect for her (6-inch size, 60 pound Pointer), and the ball held up well against her abuse. The rope was destroyed after about an hour or two of playtime, but we expected as much, as our dog is known to destroy her toys with great relish. I can see myself buying this toy in future summers, and I would definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a good backyard toy!, My dogs love this ball. The ball is durable & can kick it without breaking a toe. I rated 4 stars because the rope is not that durable. I do have 3 big dogs. The rope lasted a day but the ball is great. This is my 2nd one., I have another one of these in the same size, but different color. The blue one I have is solid, sturdy, and has lasted several months. This one had a puncture hole in it within 5 minutes - completely different than the blue one and a total waste of money. It’s actually such poor quality that I wonder if it’s not even the real jolly brand!, I bought this toy for my 9 dogs as one of their Christmas gifts. It’s survived a week of tugging and tossing between a variety of different breeds & sizes from pit bull mixes to a Jack Russel. It’s of good quality and should last a couple of months at least. Definitely will be getting more in the future. The price is nice as well. The big box pet stores sell this brand at double to triple the Chewy.com price., I am Rosie a cane Corso and I chew threw everything , this ball keeps me busy and lasts longer then any toy my family has gotten me .. Santa gave me a new ball for Christmas and I got so happy I ran right to it in the morning, Our German Shepherd shreds all of his toys but this ball has lasted! Fun to play fetch with., I have a highly destructive young dog. When I first felt the material of the jolly ball. I thought no way is this going to last. This is the longest lasting toy in our house next to a Kong extreme. She loves to whip it around and play tug, then at the end of all that excitement she will sit down and chew on the ball for hours. It has so many teeth holes it's incredible and yet it's still is held together firmly with no chunks being taken out.]

title: USA-K9 Cherry Bomb Treat Dispensing Tough Dog Chew Toy
descriptions:
["The USA-K9 Cherry Bomb Dog Chew Toy is an explosive good time. The attached rope makes this one top-notch training tool and mealtime toy that's hard to beat or break. With its convenient opening on the rubber ball, you can easily keep it full of treats for your impatient canine companion. Made with a natural rubber compound that is non-toxic and biodegradable, the only thing you'll have to worry about is keeping it stocked with your sidekick's favorite goodies. Pups with a short fuse and nothing to chew will find relief in its durable Puppyprene power chewer natural rubber compound construction. It's also dishwasher safe, so you can easily defuse any nasty situation.", '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by USA-K9
']
key_benefits: ['The attached rope gives this fun toy additional control during training and playtime.', 'With a convenient hole on the rubber ball, you can customize a delicious payload for your pooch.', 'Made from Puppyprene, a proprietary power-chewer rubber compound that’s durable enough to withstand the most explosive of chewing sessions.', "It's dishwasher safe so you won't blow a fuse when it's time to clean your BFF's new favorite toy.", 'Proudly made in the USA.']
reviews: [Durable toy for pitbull puppies or tough breeds. My pitbull is one years old and has had this toy for almost a month now, which is good for someone who has tough dogs that like to tear up everything. I personally, like to stick treats in the center well i’m working to keep my pup occupied for awhile., This is great. It has a rope that they love to chew on and also makes it fun to throw. It’s a ball, what dog could resist and a treat dispenser. My puppy loves to destroy things but not this thing yet. Both dogs love to play tug-of-war with it.. just a great item., I was really surprised that the rope was made of such flimsy material. My little 6 lb puppy was able to chew through that in a very short time. The sturdiness of the rope should've matched the sturdiness of the ball. I would not have bought this item if I knew the rope was not durable., We read the reviews and our dog LITERALLY WITHIN SECONDS chewed up the rope part!!!! Did not withstand chew test after 1 minute., The minute he saw this he got very wild. We swing it around in the air like a lasso to get his attention and he is hypnotized. He loves to carry this toy around by the rope and fling it about his head, it’s hysterical to watch, and he seems obsessed with it. It is kind of a German Shepherd sized toy, and he’s only 30 pounds but he’s very athletic, crazy and likes big toys., I bought these as take-home gifts for a litter of mouthy Portuguese Water Dog puppies, thinking the owners could use them later on for fetch training, or for crate play. I was surprised that the puppies (6-8 weeks old) LOVED them! Used them as tug toys, chewed on the rope, rolled the ball around. Very pleased to have such a good sturdy useful toy to send home with my new families., My dog is very destructive with toys, but this one she loves to toss around, it’s very comical. She has not chewed it up! Also little treats can be put inside., Our 6 month old rescue puppy loves this toy! She loves playing fetch with it and bringing it back for more playtime. Love that we can put a treat inside and keep her busy trying to get it out. Had my doubts when I ordered it but so glad I did as it is now a favorite go to toy!, We have three girls with the husky being dominant. She never lets this toy get out of her site. I haven't even put a treat in it and she chews it vigorously, tosses it (it bounces!) and rolls on it!. She hasn't been able to put a scratch on it either and a lot of those wimpy plastic toys end up breaking. Very happy with this and highly recommend it., My 90 pound shepherd mix loves this toy. She holds the string in her mouth and runs around flinging it around the yard. Her new favorite.]

title: KONG Dental with Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['The KONG Dental has special grooves that clean teeth and gums as dogs chew. KONG Easy Treat can be used inside the grooves to get your dog chewing. Fill the inside of the Dental with KONG Snacks or Ziggies to satisfy your dog’s curiosity.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', 'For Stuffing Paste: Click here', '

                        See all items by KONG
']
key_benefits: ['Made of durable KONG natural rubber for a long-lasting toy.', 'Fun to chase and fetch with a replaceable rope, and is designed for the average chewer.', "Great for use with Stuff'N Easy Treat paste to make this toy even more exciting.", 'Patented Denta-Ridges reduce plaque while providing a gentle abrasive cleaning and conditioning of teeth and gums.', 'Available in two sizes: Small and Medium, so you can pick the perfect fit for your pup.']
reviews: [I have come to expect a high level of quality and durability from Kong products. This toy did not meet that expectation. Our dogs (40 lb pit mix and 85 lb Great Pyrenees/Dalmatian mix) untied the knots and removed the kong in less than 5 minutes of playing. They severed the rope in less than an hour. So, rather than having a toy they can play with together, they have two short ropes and one kong., My puppy was very excited to get this toy. Kong products have been a big hit with her. They are usually durable, at least the rubber parts are. The rope on this toy didn’t even last 3 hours., My young pooch is just learning how to play tug games..... thought this would be a good option as she likes her other red KONG toys. Very disappointed that after two "tugs" the knots came undone and rope came out of the holes... and is nearly impossible to thread back through...thought I could re string and tie it in a circle; no so much. Now its just another roll- around toy., Got this for my teething 2lb chiweenie puppy and he’s not the only one who loves it! It’s our 15lb ginger cat Tiggy’s favorite toy as well. The toy is very durable and they both love the tassels on the ends., Lasted all of one day. Two 15 pound Dogs chewed through the rope right away. Waste of money., Toy lasted 5 minutes. Dog tore it in half. Worst Kong toy ever bought. Waste of money!, Etta is a 10-month-old, 40-lb. mutt. In 90 minutes or so she had bitten the rope in four pieces and had untied the knots. She’s not an aggressive chewer. I threw the rope away but kept the red rubber part. This is the first time Kong has disappointed us. I just replaced one Kong toy that we’ve used for decades (through southern summers in the yard and run through the dishwasher countless times) because it finally began to flake. Save your money. Kong makes much sturdier toys. Keep shopping., Favorite toy! This was my first dogs number one toy and 16 years later it had seen better days. The new one was a welcomed sight., Our 40 lb dog loves this toy and hasn’t torn it up yet!, Precious was so happy to get her new toy. She is a miniature poodle around 12 pounds. I ordered the medium for her which is alittle big. However, she doesn’t mind and chews on the rope each day. She is able to put the rubber KONG in her mouth, but because is too big she prefers the rope.]

This cute, stuffing-free fox toy is made of tough Cordura material with reinforced stitching, for loads of shaking, chewing and carrying fun. reviews: [I've said for several months I need to write a review about this toy because I am honestly amazed that my girl has not torn it to pieces yet. Tug ropes are her thing, but I'm tired of counting the hours and sometimes minutes until she's proved they won't last very long. She will clamp down on one ear of her fox and tug/pull you and it. The Fox Jigglerz has not ripped or frayed. I plan to purchase the others,as it has proven to be a great find!, My dog had this toy for 20 minutes. She’s already managed to rip off one of the legs and is chewing on the fur. We’ll see how long it lasts before I have to take it away from her., Most toys don't last as they are quickly destroyed, but this has passed the test. I like that there is no fluff in it either, so when it does come to an end I won't have to worry about him ingesting anything he shouldn't., I keep finding little orange fuzz everywhere from the fox but my dog likes the toy., My daughter order this for our dog but the cat wrestles with it too. As promised. Cute, noisy and, so far, durable., My Australian shepherd loves this toy and it stands up well to her rough play and chewing.]

reviews: [Really like it, didn't realize how loud the bell would be, it actually scared the pups at first but once they got used to it they like to play with it! reviews: [I have 3 dogs and one is a puppy ( a pitbull, a westie and a Belgian malinois) and I bought this about a month ago and it’s still in one piece which is amazing because most toys don’t last a couple hours. title: Jax and Bones Coco The Elephant Rope Dog Toy, Jumbo
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Coco the Elephant Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jax and Bones
']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [I purchased it as a birthday gift for my 2 year old German Shepherd, not expecting it to last more than a day. He shredded the tail in the first 2 minutes. The trunk took a week to shred. My 2 collie puppies have gotten endless enjoyment from shredding the rope apart. If you have a power chewer I recommend getting one that doesn’t have a lot of thin extremities!, My 1 year old dog got this toy today and is already tearing it apart. I thought it would be more durable. The plush stuffed animal I got is lasting longer than this toy., Nice big toy definitely for a bigger dog or power chewer. Toy is meant to be torn apart. We have always loved Jax and bones toys iv never seen one this big my pit is going through hartwrom treatment and this is a great activity toy for him!!, I purchased two similar toys and my 5 month old Great Dane loves spending his time chewing on this., This toy survived a little over one week with my new puppy. I thought it would be more durable, It is a nice toy for dogs but I think it would be better for a larger dog. The toy is kind of heavy. I have a Norfolk Terrior and not very tall. He really doesn't care for it. I think a taller dog would enjoy this more because of the weight of the toy. Still nice. I'll give it to a friend who has a Labador., It took my husky 20 minutes to destroy it completly. It was split in half, all the inside out. It supposed to be hard to break and it is pretty expensive too., yes it will not look like an elephant for long... but it has lasted and she loves it., I have a 7 month old blue tick coon hound, who loves to chew. I can't get him anything that is stuffed, or has a squeaker, or I will have stuffing all over the house within minutes. I thought a braided, knotted rope would be more durable, but I was wrong. I attached a picture of the elephant less than 12 hours after he got it. I will be cutting off the fringe and somehow working it out so that we only have the body left]

reviews: [Yes, it is tiny, so while I can't use it to wrestle with my dog (Shih Poo), he has a lot of fun slinging it around and chewing on it., My 16 week old Labrador female pup totally destroyed one of the large size. She fortunately vomited a wad of the strings before they could form a blockage in her intestines. I have had several of these in the past that held up much better. Apparently they have found a cheaper way to make these, probably in China., My dog is a destroyer when it comes to toys. I honestly only bought this rope because I needed to add like $0.50 to an order to get free shipping; so, for the cheap price, I figured it would be shredded in just a couple days. On a happy note, it's still holding up and my pup loves playing with it, she's practically ignoring all the other (more expensive) toys now., I would not recommend this dog toy as large strings came off rather easy and my dog got sick and could not go to the bathroom. We watched her with the toy and removed it when that happened. I would not recommend this for aggressive chewers. She is a 25 pound sheltie., Ohhhhhh, these are GREAT for furry thieves. My one dog (I have 5) is such a thief who LOVES to take items ie: one (just one) of MY slippers or a sock & if I see him we will have a tug of war which he usually wins, how I don't know, then when I don't notice, he will take MY slipper or sock outside & bury it. Last yr I had 3 slippers, ALLLLL without a partner. BUT...now with these knotted ropes we can play tug of war & so far he hasn't buried any of them AND he leaves my slippers alone. What a GREAT & simple idea someone had. We both love these. Thank You!!!, I bought the x-small on accident for my Kammi bear. She is a 24 pound baby who loves to bite rope. The rope started to curl when it was wet and stayed curled. This may be due to the size of the x-small rope. Overall, it was okay for the price but it did not hold up well., Puppies love this, and spend hours chewing each time they get one., Thought it might be too small....but our dog loves to carry it around. It just fits in her mouth like a horse bit. Plus she likes the fringes!, Great toy for my energetic Bischon and she loves playing pulling, Chloe loves playing tug a war with this rope. Since she is a little dog it is great to build up her teeth and gums. We play for hours]

I have a monster chewer. It seemed it went from being whole to having the squeaker ball torn out in a matter of minutes. So sad, Within 5 min there was a hole chewed in the tennis ball portion (the blue paw/heart) - it may work for an older dog that likes to fetch - held up for tugging - but not for a pup that likes to chew :(, I wish I had read the reviews. My lab had this for maybe 25-30 minutes while I did some vacuuming. When I was done, this is what I found. I was so disappointed because he took right to it and loved it!, My dog still had this toy chewed up in less than a day. I wish someone could invent a material that my dog cannot chew up. He loves throwing this toy around though but we can't have him eating the material and threads. I would recommend it for dogs that don't seem to chew up their toys and eat them., Our first version of this toy lasted 3 months. The 2nd one lasted two weeks. Our 21 pound dog started ripping out the thread, so it had to be tossed. The fabric is not tough enough nor is the thread. Do not bother with this toy if your dog is a determined chewer.]

reviews: [3-D glasses were a staple in my childhood. I’m so happy that my pups get to experience the same joy, and I get to reminisce in the memories. This toy has a strong rope and a nice fabric. The lens have pretty cool texture to it that my dogs like to go crazy with. Oh, of course they squeak too! #ChewyTeamRated, You have to be older like me to remember blue/red 3-D glasses! What a memory flashback! Thanks for making this toy! Love seeing this around the house. #ChewyTeamRated, These glasses are so fun to play tug with! My dog loves pulling on the rope and squeaking the lenses. I love the retro look as well! #chewyteamrated]

title: Squishy Face Studio Fleece Lure Replacement Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Keep the fun going with the Squishy Face Studio Fleece Lure Dog Toy. Your dog is going to love the Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2 so much that you’re going to need to replace the lure occasionally. Made from soft braided fleece, this toy is much safer than rope toys since there are no loose threads–and as an added benefit, this toy cleans your dog’s teeth while he chews. Just as fun off the pole, this lure can also be thrown for a fun game of fetch. When this toy is dirty, just throw it in the wash and it’s ready to be played with again!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', 'Use the Squishy Face Lure Replacement with the Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2.', '

']
key_benefits: ["Made with soft fleece which helps to clean your dog's teeth while he plays and chews.", 'Designed with a loop at one end, a 4-strand braided mid-section and large tassels that will attract your dog. .', 'This toy is perfect to attach to the Squishy Face Studio Flirt Pole V2 or throw for a game of fetch.', 'Made from soft braided fleece so it’s safer than rope toys which can fray and choke your dog.', 'Easy to care for, this lure can be thrown in the washing machine after a dirty day of play.']
reviews: [Our year old boxer is obsessed with her flirt pole! I tried making home made replacement lures but she wasnt as crazy about them! Chewy had them to our door within a week!, Perfect attachment for his squishy face. Durable and he loves the fleece texture., This is the perfect replacement lure for the squishy face flirt pole. Using the flirt pole with lure is an excellent way to quickly exercise and tire your high drive dog., Great toy for the price. I need to replace these every week or two, but that is to be expected., This is a replacement for our squishy face toy. Let me tell you, I have two large dog's, brother and sister and they LOVE CHASING THIS!!!!!!!, My goldens like lure so we are hoping these will be stronger and better than things we have, I am about to purchase my second flirt pole for my 2 year old heeler mix. This has been absolutely her favorite thing to play with and I use it to keep up with her “drop it” and “sit” and “stay” commands. She will do anything for a few more minutes with the flirt pole!, I made a flirt stick and put this toy on the end. It’s holds up to working dogs! I’ve had it for 5 months now and it’s still held together!, Great way to combine fun and exercise that you both will enjoy. My dog is tough on chew toys so I don't expect these to last too long, but easy to replace. To make the product even better, like to see a quick release so lures can be changed out even faster., Love the lure pole...so much that we needed a replacement toy!]

title: JW Pet Invincible Chains Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
["JW Pet Invincible Chains feature the rubber texture dogs love to chew on. The solid, no glue construction stands up to the abuse. The invincible chains make a terrific tug as well because it's easy to hold on to while your dog tugs will all his or her might. key_benefits: ['Easy to hold makes great for tugging', 'Made of non-toxic durable rubber', 'Perfect for interactive play', 'Promotes exercise and helps eliminate boredom', 'Designed to withstand even the toughest puppy love']
reviews: [I bought 2 of these, one for my 70lb german shepard/doberman and one for my 80lb pit mix. Both dogs love playing with them. My shepard had it ripped in half within 5 minutes, but still loves playing tug with the pieces. The other one is still intact, guess the other guy is a little gentler. Great toy, but if you've got a chewer, it's pretty easy to chew through., The pups love them whether playing alone or playing tug of war together, This is a great durable tour but the name chain implies more than one ring linked together which is exactly why I bought it. Was disappointed it was one plain old ring., However my 9 month old puppy chewed through both rings in less than a week. If your dog is not a chewer it's a great toy, My 50lb goldendoodle LOVED this and it is great to play tug with. Unfortunately, he sat down for an extended chew and bit a chunk out., My dog had chunks out ofnit withing the first day. Good tug a war tog though., It was my understanding that this toy was designed with strong chewers in mind. That is why I chose it as one of my Labrador Pup's Christmas items. Unfortunately it did not live up to its name or description. Within LESS than 24 hours of play, my pup was pulling chunks of rubber off the rings, thus it was necessary for meto take the toy away from him. I would not recommend this toy for strong or power chewers according to the experience I have had with it., We have a Lab that needs tough toys and like many of the other JW PET rubber toys this one holds up well. He chews and plays tug of war and this toy as well as the footballs, Hol-ee Roller and Action Dog Toy show no signs of wear after constant heavy use! These toys are a great addition to any dog's playthings!, Unfortunately after about 45 minutes of chewing and playing with this I noticed little chunks of the toy coming off the surface. Not the best., Love this product. Our previous dog rejected all toys but theses. They last for years and provide hours of chasing,retrieving and chewing. Our current Australian Kelpie cannot get through a day without a lot of ring play. I felt so fortunate that you had them for sale. I couldn't find them in any of the four per stores that I visited and the old ones are getting a bit worn out. I bought 3 and put two away for the future.]

reviews: [I am forever on the search for a toy our miniature Bernedoodle will not chew through. I was hopeful this toy would last a while. title: Jax and Bones Brent the Brontosaurus Rope Dog Toy, Large
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Brent the Brontosaurus Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [We love this toy for our 20 pound corgi. He destroys toys in 2 minutes but this toy lasted 4 months! Holds together so well against our heavy chewer. Highly recommend!, My border collie had it ripped apart in under five minutes. The ropes aren’t secured enough and I was afraid she would choke on it., My healer loves the jumbo Jax rope toys for tug and fetch playtime. She is still a chewer and finds the vulnerable spot and this toy does shred. However, the knotted construction allows for this but whole still maintaining some of its shape., I bought this for my friend’s greyhounds and they love it!!!, Brent was a handsome looking fellow, but became a three legged dino after about 10 minutes of play., My rescue dog chews through everything including the black kongs..... These rope toys, we also have the giraffe, take a beating. They get stringy but he loves them. Even when they are rough looking, he continues to play with them and enjoy them. They are his favorites. If you have a chewer, I would recommend you try these. They are definitely tougher than the other rope toys we've purchased., My newfie pup destroyed this in 20 mins and had to be thrown away. The center is stuffed with various smaller pieces of the rope that she tried to eat., Our large puppy who is teething LOVES his dinosaur. Absolutely his favorite toy, and he has a lot. The rope does fray, which is great for pulling and flossing and the big center is great for heavy chomping for his incoming molars., Jimmy played with this for maybe an hour and had the many ropes cut through and fraying., My German shepherd was pulling this sort in less than an hour, leaving threads all over.]

Ideal for a game of tug-o-war, a durable nylon cord connects the two balls together with soft inside cores that absorb water. It also floats so feel free to take it to the pool, beach or lake. With bright colors for increased visibility, you and your sidekick will be sure to find the Chuckit! Hydrosqueeze Duo Tug Dog Toy wherever you throw it.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. reviews: [Our little dogs love to swim out for this as they can use the webbing to bring it in., This was destroyed in 20 minutes. This might work for small dogs 40lbs or less but not for a dog 50lbs or over. I was disappointed being a Chuckit! product, I expected better., I bought this hoping it would be the same as the non-hydro squeeze tug o war toy. It lasted less than a month using the toy as it was described. The other one lasted over a year even though it was left outside. Thankfully the larger version of the other one came back in stock. It's his favorite and totally worth the money lasting as long as it did., Our husky puppy shreds everything and love to chew on the strap and the ends. However, the 2 blue fabric balls had to be removed. He caught one with his tooth and yanked it out. Other than those fabric balls being removed it is an awesome toy!, My two Aussies love this toy. Keeps them busy. They play tug of war and are so entertaining., This toy does not float! My GSD was so excited for this new toy! She went running into the pool to find that her new toy was gone. She was so confused when it sunk to the bottom of the pool. After three days of sitting in the bottom of the pool, the balls no longer have any color in them either., Bought this thinking it wound stand up to a mastiff puppy but even at first glance could tell it wasn't up to the job. Maybe beagle but not a mastiff, Two dogs will destroy this toy with in mins. I had my dog and another dog play tug a war and with in 5 mins. It didn’t last. I sent it back to Chewy and I get no refund or any response. Not happy, My 4 month old puppy has been playing tug with this everywhere from the beach to the vet's office for two months now, and it's still holding up! She's not exactly gentle, either., Unfortunately I searched for large dog toys. and this came up in the search. But it only lasted a week with tugging. Great pool toy too for small dogs.]

reviews: [I love this toy and came back to purchase a second! It is great for playing fetch, especially in the winter. This duck "floats" on soft snow better than any other toy I've found. The rope is great for a game of tug-of-war, too! I've found that the heavy canvas fabric lasts much longer than a typical stuffed toy and is easier to clean., These were fun. For as long as they lasted. My medium size doodle chew through these in no time!!, My GR LOVES these ducks. We have two dogs a GSD and a GR and the golden knows when we get these ducks they're HIS new toy. He has had one for almost a year and he has torn off the tail end but nothing else. They're very sturdy toys not easy for them to tare up., My pup absolutely ADORES this toy. It was the first toy she started to play with after I rescued her and one of the few she chooses to play with while alone. I highly recommend this toy if your pup likes rope toys, but wants a little more to chew on. The weakest parts are the ties where the rope is connected to the bird, but I tied the rope back onto the surviving loops to prolong my need to buy her another one., My Golden destroys toys. And yes the rope is frayed, I knot it up. But the nylon body is holding up! We joked about it making an hour, 2, then 3, into the evening, a whole day, another whole day, then why it's been a week, 2, 3......not so pretty any more but her go to toy and the body still whole., Our 5 year old loves her toys & this one in particular! (If your dog is a “chewer & a ripper”, keep an eye on them with this toy), Sadly my babies loved this so much it didn't last 5 mins :(, The toy is great but the select color link led to other toy choices not color choice, My dog loves this and keeps it next to her when she naps!, love these colors!Dogs see some color, like a yellow,blue and grey washout.The birds are heavy shoelace roped;pull by the tail to tighten.I put bird training wing feathers under the laces.My 5mo old GSP will retrieve up to 3 birds at once, each month add a bird until he gets confused.]

title: Nerf Dog Light Up LED Barbell Dog Toy, Medium
descriptions:
['The Nerf Dog Light Up LED Barbell Dog Toy combines all the fun of playing fetch with a uniquely designed toy that you can keep using after the sun goes down. This barbell-shaped toy has an LED light in each end that flashes bright colors as it flies through the air. It’s visible up to 300 feet away so you and your pup can have a nighttime play session without losing sight of his favorite toy. The rubber exterior gives you a good grip for throwing. And when it lands, the fun continues as it bounces back and forth with your pooch eagerly chasing behind. The cutouts help keep it above water and make it easier for your dog to pick up in his mouth so the game can start all over again.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. reviews: [We called it a “Leave It” toy since it is not durable for chewing. Perfect for late night fetching but one side no longer works and after bouncing the other light turns off. ): It worked perfectly for the first 2 weeks and was well taken care of. Just not worth the high price for the quality received., Although my dogs were super excited about this toy, it didn’t make it 5 minutes. Good concept but not durable at all., Our dog absolutely LOVES these well made and durable rubber bones. She loves to fetch at night. They are so incredibly durable. Our dog threw one in our pool , where it stayed at the bottom for 48 hours- it still lights up and works great!! Can’t recommend highly enough!, My Bernese Mt Dog loves this toy! He had a light up toy that was great for finding in the snow, but it was destroyed. This one will last. We started with the Nerf light up ball, but my cattle dog chewed the outer shell off, so he’s not allowed to use this., Great toy but not too good for chewers. He had this thing chewed up in 1 minutes!, My two Boston Terriers loved playing and tugging on this toy., My first impression was that this was the coolest toy ever. My dog loved it! HOWEVER, after less than 10 minutes of play (not tug of war or real rough chewing -- just regular throw and retrieve) the plastic around the balls tore. It is way too fragile for any dog toy. It has a lot of potential and hopefully Nerf will remake it with better materials. As it is now, though, don't waste your money., I would like it to light up when the dog plays with the toy, My 11 month old pup destroyed this within 5 minutes. He pulled a piece off the end and the ball came out., This was one of the 3 new toys I bought for my dog and it was instantly his favorite toy out of the bunch. He is pretty rough with his toys and Nerf toys always hold up well to his chewing. The lights are bright too! Perfect for night time fetch.]

reviews: [Just ordered our 2nd of these, as 1st one purchased for our Golden Retriever (soon to be 3) simply wore out. He LOVES this toy; it's remained his favorite for outdoors! Chose the longer, 12" one this time, as when we play tug, when he "adjusts" his hold, we "adjust" our fingers!! Stick length ordered may be influenced by your dog's level of agressiveness in play. Our 80-pounder still has his original stuffed animals, so he's not a destructive chewer. The Nerf stick core did dry out over time (one end became brittle after 2 years); one end loop frayed. Overall, it held up well, spending much time in the FL rain/sun. These 2 characteristics, aggressive play and chewing, may play into your decision, We got this toy delivered today- I chose it because it said it was designed to withstand hours of tough play and chewing. Unfortunately our tough chewer ripped the thing apart in about 10 minutes, leaving little neon green fragments all over my couch. I’m just glad I was nearby to make sure he didn’t swallow any pieces! Really disappointing considering this wasn’t cheap. If you’re just looking for a toy to play fetch with then it’s probably fine, but definitely not for rough players or chewers, Floats and is holding up nicely for my chewer. I bought 4 of them and would buy them again.]

reviews: [We got this because she likes to try to get us to tug at a ball in her mouth, but we don't want to put our fingers too near her teeth. Within the first few minutes, I noticed she was pulling off the blue letters, so I pulled the rest off myself and gave it back. Then she began chewing up the rope. It didn't take long to chew right through. There are some pieces of rope left, so tugging with her is still possible, but she usually brings us her orbee-tuff squeak ball for that. I would replace a stronger rope, but this one has a big knot inside the ball, and can't be pulled out through the small holes. I'm sure this ball would be great for a dog that doesn't prefer to chew up the rope. [But definitely, I ordered this for my adult mini schnoodle since she loves to play tug, but this ball was way too big, hard, and heavy. She instead enjoys the rope which she tries to use to drag the ball around. I wouldn’t suggest for smaller breeds., This is by far my puppy's favorite toy. She loves to play tug of war with the rope, and she loves to chase the ball when I throw it - it's very bouncey. She also loves to just hold the rope and swing the ball around by herself, which keeps her occupied for quite awhile! If you have a high energy puppy who needs something to help them blow off steam, get this toy! It's also extremely durable!, A few tosses, a couple tugs and we ended up with just a ball. Definitely not worth the money. You're just paying for the name Planet Blue Dog., The Orbie-Tuff Fetch Ball with Rope is great fun! The ball is a little larger than I expected, but my small Golden Retriever has adjusted to it and loves it! For training, I can stick it in a pocket while we are working, and then pull it out for a joyful reward. I can throw it, and tug with it, and it even floats in the pool!, I really wanted to like this toy as my pup loves rope toys, unfortunately this one lasted less than 30 min before it began to tear. Definitely not worth it if you have a tough chewer ):, Ball lasted one night ! Not good if your dogs a chewer . I took a gamble on this I usually get West Paw balls but there sold out, One bite & dog bit thru rope like a scissors. Ball survived, I have bought several of these Fetch balls - dogs love them and I don’t have to touch the slime., My German Shepherd loved this when we got it. Within less than a week, however, the ball broke clean through the rope. It broke in half. Usually planet dog products are sturdier.]

title: Jax and Bones Anchor Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Anchor Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jax and Bones
']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [This is our second Jax and Bones toy. I was worried the dark colors would stain but nope! Our 4-month-old loves to chew, of course, and these do the trick! Such fun shapes, too. I'll be buying more in the future., If you want a toy that lasts more than 5 minutes then don't buy this toy. My dog shredded this toy immediately. Also I thought this toy would be bigger than it was. I don't recommend this toy, I will stick with Kong products., I've been looking for something that my dog can't destroy, and this might have a chance. We've been playing and chewing on this for over two weeks and it hasn't frayed, untied or ripped yet. Other "tuff" toys have been destroyed in mere seconds., I was hoping this would last more than a day. It did not. There is still about a 4 inch section that is intact but it will probably be gone in a few more days., she did start ripping it apart, but she does that with most toys., This rope toy began unraveling within the first 5 minutes of play., Our lab puppy is chewing through most toys but this anchor still looks new and he loves tug time with it., Nowhere close to big enough for two 70 lb dogs to play tug of war with which is what I asked for. Maybe 10" long and 8" wide across the bottom. Was amazed at size for $15.00. Better last a long time. Would return but husband already gave it to the dogs., This last a long time. She chases it and roughs it up., She loves it, plays with it all the time by herself or with someone throwing it for her.]

reviews: [Our Cavalier King Charles spaniel destroyed this product in one day. Honestly, it is simply not tough enough for a dog toy. reviews: [My new human mom hit me this play toy but in a weeks time I demolished it. You see, as soon as I got it I didn’t want any other toy & yes I slept with it too. I been good with the other toys but I am still hoping my human mom gets me another in her pay day., Disappointed in this order. The seem broke the first day and the stuffing is now falling out., I loved the look, but my 5 month old Dalmatian tore it to pieces in under 2 hours. It will not hold up to rough play., Looks great and I was super excited for it. The plush ball part gets torn up extremely easy., I have a 5 year old boxer and 1 year old frenchie.... this thing lasted forever!!! its their favorite toy to play with together which makes for the perfect toy in any dog home, We have two dogs who love to tug-a-war on anything long enough for them both to grab and this toy they love to pull and run side by side. He usually doesn’t tear up toys but as soon as he bit into ball it punctured it and stuffing came out. Wish I had read the negative reviews before purchasing., Great quality with bery tight seams so it can’t be torn., Bought this as a Christmas gift for my dog who is very gentle with her toys. It did take him awhile to eat the rope on the end into string, but then it didn't take long to eat the end out of the football and get into the stuffing! He's a mess!! It really is an awesome OU football though!!]

title: Pet Champion Strategy Camo Retreiver Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Your sidekick will feel like an Olympic hammer-throw champion when you play with the Strategy Retriever dog toy. Covered in traditional, pink or green camo, this three-piece toy is designed for outdoor play. And it's made from three of your pup's favorite things: a tennis ball, a rope and a squeaky plush. Hold the toy from either end, give it a good swing, and fling it across the lawn. Your little athlete will love running to catch this dynamic toy. It's built with rugged oxford material—so it's designed for ruff play—while the hidden squeaker helps to hold your pup's attention. Perfect for games in the backyard, at the dog park or anywhere else you exercise with your dog, this retriever toy will show him how to go for the gold.", '

                        See all items by Pet Champion
']
key_benefits: ['Features a sturdy oxford material, so it can stand up to your throws.', 'Built with a squeaker inside the tubular end.', 'Made in 3 fun, camo colors and built for outdoor play.', 'Light and easy to throw, which makes it ideal for games of fetch.', 'Includes 3 textures that dogs love, to keep your BFF engaged.']
reviews: [While we're able to use the ball for fetching & Hemi still plays with the other piece..I barely got the tag off when he grabbed onto it & the ball instantly came off.I was honestly hoping it would last a while as a unit because he likes fetching.If the company that makes these uses a non-toxic strong glue in the little rubber cap that the rope goes into that's inside the ball piece,maybe it'd stay together better :), Unfortunately this was destroyed before I think we had the true potential of used it the way it was supposed to be fun. My Labs chewed thru this in a quick minute., The ball part of toy was easy for the dog to chew off, leaving a plastic tip on rope. :Lower part has held together. Good for dog that gets tired of chewing and enjoys just fetching., I had this product for just over a month and seem came apart., Great toy, but not sturdy enough for my Whiskey. Tore is up in 20 minutes., Our lab destroyed the toy within 5 minutes. Gutted the toy. Even rope was shredded. Sorry I bought it, When our lab found the squeaker, had a hole in it immediately, poor quality fabric for dogs!, The toy had a hole in it with stuffing bulging out within 5 minutes of my dog having it.]

title: Greenbone Pull N' Play Rope Tennis Ball Dog Toy, 10-in
descriptions:
['The Greenbone Pull N’ Play Rope Tennis Ball Dog Toy takes your furry friend’s playtime to a new level of tail-wagging worthy fun. The toy features two chewable rope ends with a felt tennis ball in the center, making it ideal for tugging, tossing and fetching! You and your best bud can spend a little quality time together indoors or outside as you two play and play with this must-have tug-of-war toy.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Greenbone
']
key_benefits: ['The dog-friendly tennis ball contains no harmful gases or coatings.', 'Featuring the same felt material your pup loves but non-toxic and safe.', 'Rope is non-abrasive and gentle on your best bud’s teeth.', 'Paw-fect for fetching, tossing and interactive play.', 'Available in eye-catching colors and designs to best match your pal’s style.']
reviews: [I thought this would be good for my older dog but she wouldn't touch it. My younger dog had the hollow ball in 6 pieces in about 10 minutes, So I'm not complaining about the product but the condition of the package was horrible thankfully it was just a chew toy or I would have been upset. Idk if the box was damaged during shipping or what. Also I kind of thought the color was pink but turned out to be orange and green it's okay tho., Pup isn’t interested in it but that’s her fault. Very cute and seems durable.]

title: Rogz Scrubz Dog Toy, Color Varies
descriptions:
['Play time with your pup just got a whole lot more fun with the ROGZ Scrubz Dog Toy. Made from thick, woven, cotton-polyester blended rope, this toy emits a fun “crackle” sound that entices and entertains your dog. A sturdy loop handle allows you to hold on firmly for a game of tug and gives you that extra fling while playing fetch. Chewing on the durable rope helps keep your best friend’s teeth clean and healthy by removing plaque and tartar buildup; the playful fringe and large knot allow for even more fun chewing variety.', 'Ships in a variety of random and fun colors!', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Rogz
']
key_benefits: ['Made from thick, woven, cotton-polyester blended rope; emits a fun “crackle” sound that entices and entertains your dog.', 'Sturdy loop handle allows you to hold on firmly for tug and gives you that extra fling for fetch.', 'Chewing the durable rope helps keep your best friend’s teeth clean and healthy by removing plaque and tartar buildup.', 'The playful fringe and large knot allow for even more fun chewing variety.', 'Small is 12.5 inches long, medium is 17.2 inches long and large is 21.2 inches long.']
reviews: [I have 2 Corgi puppies. They love these Rogz Scrubz toys. They have been thru 5 of them. They are very rough on their toys so I have to keep an eye on them because before you no they have totally unraveled the rope. But they like them an keeps them busy., I ordered a large for my LARGE dog, but I was send a small. My dog picked it out of the box to play with it. She immediately latched on to my fingers with her puppy teeth. I don't know why I have this size, but I will review it. The hand grip for humans is so small that I can only get three fingers in the loop (I am a woman with slim hands). This is ungainly and difficult to control play. The toy is too thin and the knot is too small as is the tail. This is not a good pull toy for any dog., Our dog loves to play tug with this toy. It's a strong and generous size toy for our 60 lbs pittie. Note...toy is not meant to leave out unsupervised with known chewers. We only bring this out when we can play with our dog. He loves the interaction., My 10month old giant schnauzer tore this in one day. I wouldn’t recommend for chewers!, Our senior princess loves this toy! It’s light enough that she can move with it and the different chew options make for great viewing pleasure ...., I have three dogs that all love this toy. It is their go to toy when they want to engage with each other or their chosen human. They last well, one of them after a run through the mower, still usable and safe., I bought these for my terrier mix and shih tsu a month ago. My shih tsu destroys most fabric toys within minutes, but this toy has withstood his chewing. I bought the small and it's the perfect size for them to carry around. They both love this toy., My dog loves this toy during training. It is small enough to keep in my pocket and not too big for her small mouth., This is the second order for this toy. I have two Shitzu mix dogs who are heavy chewers and this toy lasted much longer than anything else I have bought them., This is a great toy for cats who like to chew. I have a cat who loves to chew on his toys and has destroyed many of them. This toy is very durable and he loves chewing on it.]

title: Nylabone Power Play Shake-a-Toss Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Keep your pup on her toes with Nylabone’s Power Play Interactive Shake-a-Toss Dog Toy! This game-changing toy is ready to bring the action to your paw-tner’s playtime sessions. Designed with multiple materials, the Shake-a-Toss toy features a durable rubber bone with a grippy texture for catching and fetching, along with double-layered canvas tassels for tugging and tossing. As the toy cartwheels in the air while catching some hang time, your dog will be eagerly waiting for it in anticipation to erratically bounce on the ground!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Nylabone
']
key_benefits: ['Made of durable rubber and canvas, so it can stand up to plenty of play.', 'The shape and texture of the bone make it easy for your dog to grip.', 'The canvas tassels are paw-fect for tugging and tossing.', 'Crafted with vibrant colors for high visibility.', 'Available in more than one size, so you can find the paw-fect fit for your pal.']
reviews: [I had faith that this toy would be a good fit for my lab based on my past experience with Nylabone products. I was wrong. This toy lasted a very few minutes before it was in bits and pieces., Our two boxers are super chewers. They typically destroy their toys within minutes of getting them (including "indestructible" ones). This toy has lasted more than a week and they both are playing tug with it. One of the ropes is starting to shred - but hey! it's ok as it has lasted far longer than I thought it would., My dog loves rope toys but they aren’t always durable. I thought that I would give this toy a try and he loves it! We can tug, he can shake it and chew on the rubber part., My dog loves this toy! The straps are very durable my dog has not destroyed it. One of his favorite toys.]

title: Disney Nightmare Before Christmas Snake Squeaky Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:

key_benefits: ['This snaky rope toy is 24” of ghoulish good fun!', 'Made of non-toxic materials for your best boo.', 'Throw it in the wash after those slobbering good times.', 'Chew toys are great for teething and entertaining high-energy furry friends.', 'A paw-fect holiday gift or just-because present.']
reviews: [I don’t usually write reviews. It’s a cool toy, I love nightmare before Christmas but it is a poorly made toy. My dog doesn’t destroy toys in 1 day. Takes awhile for her to tear them apart but this toy the tail already became untied and the squeaker stopped working after a couple of minutes of her just throwing it around. Then 5 minutes later the seam already ripped open on the head. Love the design but this toy is poorly made and not worth the money!]

title: Nerf Dog Tuff Tug Tire Infinity Dog Toy, 10-in
descriptions:

This rubber toy features two handles so the grip feels extra secure whether she’s playing with you or another dog. The tread-like design allows her to really sink her teeth in, and helps to withstand hours of tough chewing during playtime. Once you’ve finished using it for interactive play, behavioral training or beneficial exercise, simply pop it in the dishwasher for hassle-free cleanup.', '

key_benefits: ['Grippable rubber toy is designed for tugging with both humans and other dogs.', 'Suitable for active play with dogs of all sizes and breeds.', 'Designed to withstand hours of rough play.', 'Lightweight body resembles tire treads.', 'Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.']
reviews: [My small pit terrier had this chewed up in 30 minutes.. great for tugging but not chewing., The description of this toy led me to beleive that it was durable. My doberman had a piece ripped off within 20 mins. of giving it to him, and I had to throw it out. Waste of money., My schnauzer is a very strong chewer and goes through a lot of toys. This one is hanging in there., The dogs love this toy. They play together with and sometimes just chew on. It’s a very strong toy]

title: Smart Pet Love Tender Tuff Tug Squeaky Plush Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Send your four-legged friend to the big top when you give her a Tender Tuff Tug dog toy from Smart Pet Love. Available in three different animals, this plush brings the greatest show to your living room. Between the Blue Elephant, Brown Bear and Purple Hippo, someone in this unique cast of characters is sure to suit your BFF. But, no matter which animal you befriend, you'll find a puncture-proof squeaker lurking inside the belly of the beast—so, even if the crowd gets a little rowdy, this squeaker won't quit. Plus, you'll find a delightful rope that's paw-fect for light pulling or carrying around. Like all Tender Tuff toys, it’s made with Smart Pet Love’s proprietary TearBlok® technology, so it’s designed to be strong. That means this fabric stands up to plenty of play, and you can keep the interactive fun going!", 'When your pet is playing with this pet toy observe, supervise & inspect it periodically for damage. If toy is broken or damaged do not allow pet to continue playing with the toy. If damage or separation is detected, please remove or replace. This toy is for pets only, not for children.', '

                        See all items by Smart Pet Love
']
key_benefits: ['Squishable plush is easy for your dog to pick up, carry and catch, while the extra-soft exterior is great for cuddling.', 'Puncture-proof squeaker will keep him entertained for hours, even if things get ruff.', 'Made with Smart Pet Love’s proprietary TearBlok® technology, so it can stand up to long games of fetch.', "Bright colors help to get—and keep—your BFF's attention for exciting play.", 'Interactive games allow you to bond with your dog and strengthen your unbreakable friendship.']
reviews: [My only wish was that the ball was a little lighter so she can squeak it easier but she still loves it. Just keep in mind for a medium dog, it is pretty large and squeaker hard to squeak. This is perfect for a large dog as it will not tear apart easily., Perfect toy for my baby With promo code could be better to buy , advice little bit over price]

title: Fetch for Pets Star Wars Chewbacca Squeaky Plush Rope Dog Toy, 9.5-in
descriptions:
['May the Force be with your furry one with this Star Wars Chewbacca Bone Plush Rope Dog Toy from Fetch For Cool Pets. This plush toy is the perfect cuddle buddy for your young fuzz ball and even better for a game of toss and fetch or tug-o-war. Made of polyester, it also has a squeaker on the inside to keep your canine companion interested and occupied. Whether it’s traveling to the park or playing in the Millennium Falcon, Chewie will be there to watch over your pup.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Fetch for Pets
']
key_benefits: ['Plush toy that looks just like your favorite Wookie.', 'Embroidered and made of polyester for light to medium chewers.', 'Contains a squeaker on the inside to keep your pup interested.', 'Perfect for cuddling, a game of toss and fetch or tug-o-war.', 'Officially Licensed Star Wars Product.']
reviews: [This toy was completely not worth it. We are huge Star Wars fans and got very excited when we saw this. When it finally arrived, our puppy basically shredded the back of it within 10 minutes of taking it out of the box., Very poor quality. Within 5 mins of giving her this, it had the holes in it that you can see in the picture. 10-15 mins later & it’s as you see here. She was shredding it fiber by fiber in her bed with ease. My thumb is in the hole she made within 20 mins of getting it to give size reference along with the dog that did the damage. She’s a 50 lb hound mix (rescue at 3 months old, no idea of actual breeds involved but her ears tell a lot!) & I’m a 6’1” 190 lb average male with a handspan of 9” from pinky to thumb for further reference. I wouldn’t recommend this at all unless your dog literally is the lightest chewer ever. My girl is an average chewer and she tore this apart within 30 mins. That, Worst toy that I have ever received from Chewy. One side of it was a very thin mesh like material that my 40 lb dog chewed thru in 5 minutes., My 4 month old puppy chewed it up (see picture) within 10mins. Very disappointed of the stitching and quality, Fell apart after after 2 minutes of use!! And my dog is not a toy-destroyer., When I bought this toy the picture did not show the fluff on one side. My puppy loves to eat that so I was disappointed that I was not informed of this. I’m glad to see that the pictures are better and truest depict what the toy looks like. My 12lb morkie demolishes this in less then 30mins, I supervised him and was able to prevent him from eating the fluff but his little teeth tore up the smooth side. I threw a Star Wars themed bday for my puppers so I was excited for this toy but it was a huge let down.]

key_benefits: ['All Jigglerz toys have an exclusive noisemaker that squeaks when shaken.', 'Crinkle sounds emanate from head and tail when jostled.', 'Thick Cordura material, strong stitching and no stuffing make this a tough, mess-free toy.', 'Great for dogs of all ages and sizes.', 'Elongated shape makes it great for carrying around and shaking.']

title: HuggleHounds HuggleHide Bone Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your pup a new take on a classic plaything with the HuggleHide Bone Dog Toy from HuggleHounds. Made from all-natural rawhide, it features tanned water buffalo hide in the middle and comes in the shape of a bone for your furry friend to enjoy. This bone is stuffed with cotton rope and includes a leather wrap around the middle with a heart on it. This eco-friendly toy also helps clean your paw-tner’s teeth and exercises his jaw muscles for added benefits. Whether your companion enjoys a game of fetch or just wants a chew toy, the HuggleHounds HuggleHide Bone Dog Toy will provide him with hours of amusement.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by HuggleHounds
']
key_benefits: ['Bone toy that gives your furry friend a new take on a classic plaything.', 'Made from all-natural rawhide with tanned water buffalo hide in the middle.', 'Features cotton rope stuffing to provide enhanced chewing sensation for your pup.', 'Helps clean your paw-tner’s teeth and exercises his jaw muscles.', 'Ideal as a fetch or chew toy for your companion.']
reviews: [My dog just destroyed this in 2 minutes. If your dog is a chewer don't do it., I found this toy when looking for a durable chew toy for our Boston terrier. He loves to chew on squishy toys and was thrilled to get this, unfortunately it only lasted a short while the first afternoon before he had chewed threw and was eating the braided inside. On to continue the search for a more durable toy..., My one year old Golden Retriever had this destroyed in about 10 minutes. We had to take it away and throw it in the garbage. Total waste of money!, She had it apart and starting to chew apart the ends in an hour. I was hoping it would last longer., I was pleasantly surprised with this toy. I have a heavy chewer. This toy was perfect for him. I will purchase more when they are back in stock.]

title: Paws & Pals Big Ball Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:

Constructed out of sturdy dual rope, this tempting toy is the perfect density for your kitty or small pupper to bat around. Give it a toss and he’ll happily chase, roll and wrestle. Kittens and teething puppies will love sinking their claws and teeth into this ball!', '

key_benefits: ['Ball shape is perfect for clawing, chewing, tossing and playing fetch.', 'Sturdy construction provides a welcome distraction from stress and separation anxiety.', 'Can help discourage clawing or chewing on your belongings and furniture.', 'Provides relief for clawing kitties and teething puppies.', 'Great stimulation for cats and small dogs of all breeds and ages.']
reviews: [I loved this item because it lasted longer than others that I have purchased before. It is quite heavy and the knot is tightly tied and that made it withstand the chewing from my dog. I’m thinking of getting another one for my brother’s dog, This is a sturdy toy slightly smaller than a soccer ball. It's cute and durable as long as your dog isn't a manic biter., After throwing the ball for about an hour it began to come apart...wasn’t a wise choice!, 30 minutes after taking it out the box it started to come apart.]

It’s built with special materials to withstand hours of play like thermoplastic rubber and a crinkle plush interior with squeakers to make playtime that much more exciting. Your pal will love the squeaking sounds and the Super Soaker design that’s ready for water play anytime you are! Plus, thanks to its aerodynamic stick shape, it’s the perfect toy for on-demand games of fetch indoors, at the park, or at your favorite spot.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '
