']
key_benefits: ['Built to stand up to extra tough play with thermoplastic rubber exterior.', 'With squeakers and crinkly lining inside for the noisy fun your pal loves.', 'Aerodynamic stick shape makes it perfect for on demand fetching and tugging.', 'Textured surface adds variety and the holes make water play more exciting.', 'Fun shape is perfectly portable so you can take it to your pal’s favorite spot.']
reviews: [One of the first toys to not be ripped to shreds in 10 minutes. We just play fetch and don't use it in water/pool, as is possible. Very sturdy!, This toy lasted less than one minute before my dog had chewed pieces off. Five minutes and I had to throw it away because she was eating pieces of plastic. I didn't even have a chance to try to play fetch with it. Definitely not recommended for strong chewers (my dog is a Pit - German Shepherd mix). Bummer., Bought this toy for Christmas thinking it would be durable. Nope. Totally destroyed within minutes. My dog had the head chewed off and was trying to eat the body. This is a big fat nope from our house., My dog loves this little guy! He is unable to destroy him (so far) so he plays with him for hours,, My 9 month old English bulldog hasn't put it down not once! My little mitsie loves it. She's a chewer so looking forward to buying more in the future, Had this toy for about 20 minutes and my 30 pound mini golden doodle had the bottom of the crocodile mouth chewed off. Toy does not hold up, HOWEVER, Chewy was great about it and offered to send a replacement croc or refund my money. Thanks Chewy, Fantastic chew toy. Nearly indestructible. My dog absolutely can’t put it down.]

title: Pet Qwerks Rope Ring Tough Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Your pooch will rope you into a game of pug-of-war with Pet Qwerks’ Rope Ring Dog Toy. This braided rope ring paw-vides hours of fetching fun and will soon become a fur-avorite. While you’re not always free to play, this toy is the paw-fect size for him to toss around all on his own—for satisfying independent play too. With a durable fiber and nylon construction, this toy can be enjoyed by teething pups and playful adults.', '

                        See all items by Pet Qwerks
']
key_benefits: ['Heavy-duty design is great for pug-of-war, fetch and toss with your playful pooch.', 'Braided rope paw-vides hours and hours of fun.', 'The ideal size for him to toss it by himself during independent play.', 'Paw-fect for teething pups and playful adults.', 'Durable fiber and nylon construction for confident play.']
reviews: [Bought this for my parents' two Australian Shepherds to play with, but it only took the older one about ten minutes to chew through the braids and unravel a good portion of the circle. They had fun playing tug with it for the first few minutes while it was whole, though! I would only recommend this for dogs who don't actually chew/shred rope bones., My girls love rope toys! It is their favorite tug toy. I figured this one would be fun because of its shape. They didn't even get a chance to tug with it before my smaller dog (48lb pit mix) had it starting to unravel and it is no longer a circle :( It took all of maybe 10 minutes. Smaller dogs or dogs that don't have such a power chew would probably love it. Sadly, my girls love it, it just didn't hold up long., My six month old puppy destroyed this in 24 hours. No lie. This is supposed to be for a large dog. A large chihuahua maybe., I purchased this toy to have in my home when my grand dog comes over. She is very active and tends to destroy all past toys I’ve purchased for her. Because of our “stay in place” lifestyle right now she has not been over to try it out so I gave it 3 stars till I can give a true review, I have a Great Dane and it was destroyed with in a hour. Very disappointed, My 5 month old Rottweiler chewed through it in minutes.]

title: Petique Eco Pet Ball Python Tough Squeaky Hemp Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Have your next tug of woof with the Petique Eco Pet Tough Ball Python Hemp Dog Rope. Your dog will love chewing on the natural hemp material that’s designed to stand up to all types of ruff-housing. Complete with a fun squeaker inside, this snake is anything but sneaky. Great for chewing, tugging and fetching, your pupper will want to bring his new python dog toy with him everywhere. If it gets pulled through the grass one too many times, just toss it in the washer for an easy clean-up.', '

                        See all items by Petique
']
key_benefits: ['Includes a squeaker inside for extra fun.', 'Constructed from non-toxic hemp fibers, a great alternative to synthetic toy materials.', 'Machine washable for easy cleaning.', 'Built tough for tons of precious playtime memories.', 'A hiss-terical gift for the doggo in your life!']
reviews: [I really love this Python and so does my dog. It has four loud squeakers and one chew ball at the end, I put the python on top of my dog crate so she can have a friend to look at. Sometimes I put it in the crate. My puppy likes to fall asleep with the python under her head., Sadly within 5 minutes of play the head which is full of stuffing was ripped open & pulled out. I have a 2 year old Weimaraner & a 7 month old Weimaraner that love to play tug with each other. This product states that it is Tough & great for Rough Tug & play. DEFINITELY NOT STRONG IN THE HEAD OF THIS SNAKE. However, I did manage to make this toy hold up. I realized that the body is strong. It has 6 balls knotted individually to make up the length of the body that is about 2 feet in length. I simply cut off the head & now it seems to be a Strong Tough Tugg Toy. They have now been playing with it NONSTOP for the past day without the head & they Love it. I gave this 3 Stars because the Body Seems, I love this toy! It’s WAY larger than I expected (it’s about 2 feet long!!) and our spaniel has a blast tugging it around and playing with all the squeakers. The only downside is that the head is a little flimsy, so it would probably break easily with a strong biter. If your dog is smaller or doesn’t like to tear toys open though, I bet you’ll be fine!! Very fun toy, My dogs are obsessed with squeaky toys and playing tug. I was thrilled when this toy arrived. I did not realize how large it was and that there were so many squeakers! Unfortunately they ripped the head off before the end of the afternoon. I was sad, but the whippets don’t care. The body is intact. They still love it., This toy was destroyed by my 10 month old puppy in 3 hours]

key_benefits: ['Made with multiple layers of material that are bonded and sewn together to make one "Tuff" Layer. Most toys have just one seam to hold the toy together, Tuffy\'s has 7. Webbing is sewn around the edges of the toy and then the edges are sewn together to make each toy extra Tuff. Each toy has soft edges that is easy on gums.', 'Contains 3 squeakers sewn into a squeaker safety pocket inside for an added layer of security', 'Floats in water and is machine washable (air dry)', 'Tuff scale: 9 out of 10', 'Tough and long lasting toy can be used interactively with one or multiple dogs over 20 lbs']
reviews: [I have a large breed dog, 14 months, and I find it hard to find toys he doesn't destroy in a short period of time. This toy has held up very well. He has fun playing with it and it hasn't come apart (yet)., Have a Lab/Malamute/Pitt-bull mix she tears everything up in minutes. This toy has lasted a month so far and still together!! Will be ordering more!!, My dogs love to play with this on their own or when they see the other playing, they will grab onto the other end and play together. They are tough chewers and this seems to be holding up well!, My lab mix can and does destroy every toy I buy her... but she's had this for a little over a week now and it is still in perfect condition!!! Highly recommended for aggressive chewers!!!, Dog loves it, for about 30 minutes. Then she tore a hole in it and stuffing was everywhere. I bought the ultimate rated of their line and it was awful., These are the best plush toys I have found for my little super chewer. She’s a bit mix and destroys most toys in under an hour. These last us a couple of weeks before she can find a string and get the stuffing out. Plus it’s fun for a game of tug of war., My 2 year old bernese mountain dog is a rough player so he needs a toy we can play with that doesn't fall apart after 2 sessions. Tuffy toys are the best and the only ones I buy for my pup., I love Tuffy toys. They usually last for months in my house, however my male Cane Corso was able to shred this in a couple of days. If I didn’t have such a power chewer I would have rated it 5 stars., Thank you for your speedy service, and a quality product at a very affordable price! Laura Ann R-T Mr. “Jones”, Guide Dog for the Blind, Puppy in Training, We had to return. Too hard to throw and retrieve for my medium sized pooch!]

reviews: [I have a small dog who loves rope and cloth toys, but despite her tiny stature at 8.5 pounds, her needle sharp teeth and persistent chewing always result in tots being destroyed in 2 days or less (yes, even "indestructible" items that can stand up to rotties and other large chewers). reviews: [Can’t give a definite rating because I just opened the package & haven’t given it to my pup. Only problem I have is I ordered the Alabama toy & received Penn State. Since my puppy is just going to chew it up, I don’t guess that doesn’t matter too much., My year-old lab puppy loved this from minute one, and it lasted about a week before she ripped off the logo, then the stitching, then spread the stuffing all over the house. Frankly, a week is pretty good for a stuffed toy around here! She still loves using it for tug of war, even though it's in tatters, and it's nice and easy for humans to hold, too., My American Bulldog loves this toy & it is very sturdy. We play tug-o-war with it frequently & she also loves chewing on the squeaker area when we’re not playing together., I have two, four month old, dachshund puppies. They love the toy and like to play tug of war with each other but thy were able to almost completely remove the fabric with the OSU logo the first day. The rest of the toy seems pretty durable., My Bulldog puppy loved it immediately, as she found the squeaker right away! Great grip for tug o war. Unfortunately it didn't take her long to find a weak point to open it on one side, but it's still strong enough to play with and I will buy it again., This toy is super cute . It's Huge. I have a big dog though 100 lbs. We are LSU fans so purchased that one for our German Shepherd . It's made pretty good . Hasn't had time to play with it yet but seems to be made alright. I would not recommend it for destructive chewers though. However just regular chewing is ok, Great for the first 20 min. She still plays with it. Just need to be careful of the stuffing. Fortunately our dog doesn’t eat it, just leaves it all over the floor., Such a cute toy for football fans. My dog has been playing with it non-stop!!!, This toy lasted my dogs 2 years before it finally came apart. Only one dog really played with it, and she always brought it to the humans to tug with., Love this toy especially since it for Alabama Roll Tide. But Bao has pulled it apart now.]

descriptions:

It features Therma-Fuse Technology, which bonds durable, non-toxic polymer to extra strong climbing rope to create a toy that stands up to tough play. This toy is made with environmentally friendly, sustainable and organic materials and Chew Guard Technology to be safe yet strong. This rope is also soft on the gums of your pup for more enjoyable playtime. key_benefits: ['Durable rope toy made with environmentally friendly, sustainable and organic materials.', 'Features Therma-Fuse Technology, which bonds durable, non-toxic polymer to extra strong climbing rope.', 'Soft on the gums of your furry friend for more enjoyable playtime.', 'Made with Chew Guard Technology for durability and dependability.', 'Ideal for a game of fetch or tug-o-war anywhere you take your paw-tner.']
reviews: [I recommend it for tug of war. It's intention is for tug of war and it holds up very well for that between either human vs beagle or beagle vs beagle. One beagle is an aggressive chewer and has torn away some rubber so I give it to the dogs only when I'm with them. When the aggressive chewer wins and wants to chew it, I swap it out for a cow's knee cap or buffalo horn that I buy in bulk on Chewy., Had to take the toy away after 3 minutes because it was in so many little pieces., I bought this would be the perfect toy for my 15 lb. dog who likes to chew. The salesperson said it was made for heavy chewers and should be perfect for him. N O T !!!!! In less than 10 minutes, he had torn a piece of runner away from the rope section, and had started shredding the rope. Not a very tough toy at all! Thoroughly disappointed and feel like I really wasted my money and that the product was falsely recommended., Love this toy! Last much longer than most other chew toys we’ve tried!, My great dane loved it but chewed up one of the balls within 1 hour and had to take it away from her., It only lasted about a week before my dog had it dissembled, My lab literally ate half of this ring in 10 minutes.]

title: Jax and Bones Louie the Lobster Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Louie the Lobster Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jax and Bones
']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [I bought this thinking it would help with her puppy teething but the toy is so flimsy that I gave it to her and in 2 minutes she ripped off the rope ends (where it’s balled up). She has never destroyed any other toy I’ve given her this quickly. Even the other toy I bought with this order (the squirrels one) she hasn’t torn apart. Unfortunately I can not recommend and had to throw away already., Purchased for an adult Irish Wolfhound and a 4 month old Irish puppy. Within hours they had removed the black "cord" that was holding the rope together and began unraveling the lobster. Not well made and certainly not for large dogs as recommended by chewy., Perfect for my 9lb toy poodle. He loves it. The ‘arms’ pull back and forth thru the body as he plays, so he pulls one way then switches sides to get it back! Very entertaining for him (and us). Toy is holding up with his vigorous chewing., We bought a rope lobster from ll Bean while in Maine last May. Our dog loved it. In fact, he loved it so much, that by late July, he had completely shredded it. I was surprised to find that Chewy's sold them, so I ordered a large (Should have been a Jumbo) and "Frankie" took to it just like before. Who knew that an impulse purchase would turn out to be such a great one?, It's been nearly impossible for us to find a toy that our dog will play with. I bought him a Jax & Bones rope toy a few months ago and he immediately engaged with it. This is the 2nd toy from them that we've bought and he loves this more than the first. They are designed to fray with play, so don't be surprised when it starts to slowly unravel. We can't leave it sit out because I'm fairly certain our dog will destroy it all within 24 hours without supervision, which is the only reason it gets 4 stars. We're just happy we finally found a product he likes, but obviously won't be for every dog., I have 2 220lb masstives these are great they love to chew., I have a 10 month old Boxer and this thing went from cute lobster to a pile of string and rope within a half hour. Don't recommend at all. Not even for a light chewer. Very poorly tied together., My dog loves his raggedy lobster. Picture is worth 1000 words., So just like any other toy I buy my tough chewing Aussie this toy starting falling apart within minutes of pulling it out of the package. He's had so much fun with it though and the toy is so cute! Wouldn't spend the money on it again for him but for a more gentle chewer it would be perfect., Within an hour my dog had this toy unraveled. Not worth $20.]

title: Tuggo Water-Weighted Ball & Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
["Inspired by two dogs' fascination with a bowling ball, the Water-Weighted Ball & Rope dog toy from Tuggo was built to bring your dogs the playtime of their dreams. This exceptional ball can be weighed down using water, sand or gravel for a unique, customizable playing experience. Fill with as much or as little as you'd like for a maximum weight of a whopping eighteen pounds! Whether your pal plays with you or other dogs, the durable rope can be pulled from either end for serious tug-of-war action. Even if your pup plays alone, the water gives your dog the sensation that someone else is playing along with him. This leak-proof, adjustable, floatable and portable ball is sure to be your pet's favorite toy for countless days to come.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. reviews: [I have two pit bulls, one is a chewer and the other is not. They were able to play tug of war for about 2 mins until the rope started to break apart due to my chewer. It’s hard to find a good toy that stands up to aggressive chewing and this rope did not. On the plus side, the ball is made of a very hard material and I have high hopes that will last for a while. And another plus, is the rope is replaceable so you can exchange it with something stronger!, I really can't review this item. It was a gift for my sister-in-law's dogs. She has two large dogs that like to fight over toys in the backyard. My only surprise was how hard the ball itself was. It's a very firm plastic and I was thinking it was going to be something a little bit more malleable., Ordered and super excited. Put water in it and soon as digs played water was leaking. I checked for seal and tightness but no matter what water comes out. Very disappointed, Molly the Australian Shepard loved the rope but once she conked herself with the ball that was the end. The toy filled with water may keep doggie from shaking it with the rope and protect from the big bonk. However when the rope is finished doggie is left pushing the toy around as its too hard to bite. If your dog likes to chase and push this may be for you., First one I bought 6 years ago and they finally destroyed it. It lasted along time. Also great exercise for them. Fast delivery considering the circumstances right now. Love Chewy!, Came early and my dog second ball and he loves playing with it all time and it takes beating my bull terrier is very ruff with toys and is a power chewier as we say and this ball will last him s year and l would by more of them again on chewie, Dogs don't play with it tried everythibg and they are not interested at all., I’m so excited to finally find this ball again! My girl could play with this toy for hours and hours. So durable and long lasting. 5 stars from Molly!, My giant breed pup loves this toy, but tonight he flung it around and clocked his shoulder pretty good with it. He yelped like I hadn't heard him yelp before and he didn't want to put weight on that front leg for awhile (he's ok tho' as far as I can tell). I took it away now. It's too bad as he plays with it by himself frequently, and he loves to play tug-o-war with me as well. I've been hurt by it tho' too, and when he'd run with it, he'd keep his eyes closed as it hurts to get hit in the head too., I thought my Labrador would love it- WRONG she just thought the rope was another chew toy hard plastic ball was ignored]

title: Doggles Pentapulls Hedgehog Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your energetic pal a toy designed to stand up to extra-tough playtime with the Doggles Pentapulls Hedgehog Dog Toy. Its patented "X" design and super-stitched construction makes it perfect for extra-strength pulling, shaking, and tugging in any direction. Because it’s built completely out of one solid piece with flat embroidery and no attachment points, there are no toy parts that can be torn off by even the most energetic roughhousing! Thanks to its four layers of recycled ballistic nylon that resists tears and abrasions, it’s perfect for pups who love to rough-and-tumble. Plus, the tail and legs squeak when pressed, for the loud squeaking fun your pup loves. It’s lightweight enough to be easily tossed for a quick game of fetch with your furry friend, and cuddly for those more laid-back moments.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Doggles
']
key_benefits: ['Withstands extra-rough play with four super-stitched layers of abrasion-resistant, 1680D ballistic nylon, sourced from recycled water bottles.', 'Patented, seamless "X" design has no attachment points and is flat-embroidered for a truly tear-resistant toy.', 'Five loud squeakers inside give your dog the loud squeakability he loves.', 'Great for dogs of all sizes and comes in different characters to match your pup’s personality.', 'Easy to clean material makes it the ideal, go-to squeak toy for daily use.']
reviews: [I was initially impressed by the description of this tug toy which came up when I searched "tug toys for heavy chewers" in the Chewy search bar. However, the toy itself did not live up to my expectations. This doesn't seem to be made out of "one solid piece with flat embroidery" as my pup was able to pull off the face of the toy, exposing a softer, weaker fabric. From there, she pierced a hole and removed all the stuffing. I was hoping this toy would last us a little longer. She destroyed it in roughly 3 days, which I suppose is better than the 2 hours that I usually expect from a stuffed toy. I wish this toy had been more tear and abrasion resistant as the description led me to believe., This toy is descent, my pitbull had most of the legs torn of in one day, but he likes to still play with all of it. His favorite part is the middle he runs around with it and squeaks it. Then he plays tug of war with the legs he has torn off. So we now have several toys out of one. So if you want only one toy not so good but it you want several out of one toy then it's a good toy to order., My border collie had all the legs removed from the body in about 30 minutes, however he loves playing tug of war with all the leftover parts so it was like getting 6 toys for the price of one., My Goldens love to play tug with this, long pieces makes it easy for them to grab it]

reviews: [15 minutes is all it took for my mini golden doodle to chew through this ball and start getting through to the rope. I purposely buy cheaper toys under $10 sometimes knowing my dog can destroy them quickly, but had higher expectations for this. Called Chewy for a refund and the rep was excellent and understanding. Love Chewy, hate this toy., Within 20 minutes my 1.3yo Catahoula had chewed through the ball (it’s in the garbage), chewed through the glued/taped piece of rope under the ball and cracked the plastic handle. Do not recommend for serious business chewers., Never thought it would be made as well as it is, even for German Shepherd puppy teeth!!!]

reviews: [My six month boxer destroyed this go-dog toy in a day. I was worried about how much of the toy she ate. Do not waste the money., My cane corso has become obsessed with this toy. This has been the only toy so far as not to get destroyed in under 30 minutes, i have a 60lb black lab mix. he absolutely destroyed this thing in 5 minutes. not for power chewers at all. they say it’s durable and all that. it’s not. this toy suck., I have a little dog and she loved this toy but it did not take her long to tear the rubber off. I give it 5 stars because she loved it while it lasted.]

title: Pet Qwerks Dog Toy Variety Pack for Large Dogs, 6 count
descriptions:
['Give your large pup a choice of toys with this Pet Qwerks Value Pack. It contains interactive and noise making toys to help your dog have a fun playtime and get some exercise. This pack comes with an X-Tire Ball Jingle, Pickle Fetch, Talking Babble Ball, Blinky Babble Ball, Krinkle Squeak newspaper and value-sized Peanut Butter Incredibubbles. That’s three heavy-duty balls, two fetch toys and some bubbles to keep your furry friend occupied for hours. Made specifically for larger dogs, this Value Pack from Pet Qwerks has everything you need for a howlin’ good time.', '

                        See all items by Pet Qwerks
']
key_benefits: ['Six different toys for a variety of fun for your large dog.', 'Pack contains fetch, noisemaking and exercise toys.', 'Incredibubbles are non-toxic and flavored for your pup’s enjoyment.', 'Chewing discourages destructive behavior in your furry friend.', 'Made in the USA!']
reviews: [For her first two birthdays she was not so excited, although she loved her puppy cookie cake (purchased on chewy). But this year that box of doggy toys was an absolute hit. We wrapped up the box and she opened it up and just went crazy, at first with caution because some toys made noises. But now she barks at the balls cause she realized they are voice (bark activated) and loved the crackle of the newspaper. Under our supervision she started to dismantle it, so we had to take it away but we ordered two more. We highly recommend this box of toys for our large Terrier, Plot hound brindle puppy girl. She also loves the musical birthday cake with candles that she got for her first birthday!, Most things from chewy I love! I thought this looked like a good deal for our 2 big puppies, it looked like 6 toys for $40, not bad, when I got it my son opened it before I got a chance to see it and it’s those hard tires with a bell inside, fine if your dogs like that, mine are scared of bells, 2 hard plastic balls that talk that again will be fine for someone else maybe but with a 7 year old boy these are going to get left in the rain, cracked, and the dogs can’t pick them up, and bubbles, the bubbles are very small, the dogs hate them and my son spilled half of them before I saw them (my fault) but I think they were put in there as a filler because I could get more bubbles at the dollar store, The soft toy and the pickle in a rope lasted no more than 5 minutes each. Very disappointed. Made this a very expensive purchase. Can’t believe it was recommended for large dogs. Not sure it would be good for small dogs either. The babble ball was the cheaper version that does not light up., My little buddy loves it! The babble balls keep him entertained for hours. I don’t have to do anything just watch him play., Loved the toys especially the babble balls. Only problem the batteries were dead in the flashing one due to the tab being pulled out. Other than that he has great fun with all his toys.]

title: Fetch for Pets Star Wars Chewbacca Squeaky Plush Rope Dog Toy, 8-in
descriptions:
['May the Force be with your furry one with this Star Wars Chewbacca Plush Rope Frisbee Dog Toy from Fetch For Pets. This plush toy is the perfect cuddle buddy for your young fuzz ball and even better for a game of toss and fetch or tug-o-war. Made of polyester, it also has a squeaker on the inside to keep your canine companion interested and occupied. Whether it’s traveling to the park or playing in the Millennium Falcon, Chewie will be there to watch over your pup.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Fetch for Pets
']
key_benefits: ['Plush toy that looks just like your favorite Wookie.', 'Embroidered and made of polyester for light to medium chewers.', 'Contains a squeaker on the inside to keep your pup interested.', 'Perfect for cuddling, a game of toss and fetch or tug-o-war.', 'Officially Licensed Star Wars Product.']
reviews: [This toy broke on the first day. The rope is barely attached inside with black masking tape looking piece. It slipped right out. The dog also seems super uninterested in it. You also can’t tell what it’s supposed to be it just looks like a piece of a rug or blanket in person., I’ve gone ahead and bought all the Chewbacca toys chewy has because my dog loves the first one we got so much. Fair warning, the rope eventually frayed and came apart but that happens with all rope toys for my dog., My dog loved this toy but it didn't last long. Unfortunately we will be avoiding plush squeaky toys since he's already threw up one squeaker., This looked like the perfect combination of plush toy and throwing/ fetch toy. But my dood destroyed it in 2 hours., The toy appears to be well made but my dogs just aren't very interested in playing with it. When I toss it, a lot of the time they ignore it. They like a regular plastic frisbee better outside and squeaker toys better inside., My Coton de Tuléar puppy LOVES this toy, especially the furry face and rope. I do have to keep an eye on this toy, so my puppy doesn't completely chew off Chewbacca's brown side pouch. If the squeaker hadn't stopped working literally 90 seconds after play had started, it would be the perfect toy., My dog loved this toy but it just didnt hold up to well. It lasted 3 days before it came apart., Got this toy for my little chewer and literally fell apart on the first day. Do not recommend for moderate - heavy chewers as it is easy to tear., My golden doodle loves Chewbacca. It’s fast become a favorite. Very well made, good tug toy and great to retrieve. Rope handles are strong, squeaker is perfect., I knew it when I bought it, but it came apart too easily for my tough chewer. Still a cute toy though!]

key_benefits: ['Six different toys for a variety of fun for your large dog.', 'Pack contains fetch, noisemaking and exercise toys.', 'Incredibubbles are non-toxic and flavored for your pup’s enjoyment.', 'Chewing discourages destructive behavior in your furry friend.', 'Made in the USA!']
reviews: [Though I have not tried all the toys in the set, I can tell you that I already see false advertising with the toys my dog did play with today. I gave him the newspaper fetch toy, and in 10 minutes it had a hole in it, and on top of that, it does have stuffing even though the description of the set says stuffing free. I also gave him the rope tire toy, and he was swinging it around so much I had to take it away so he would not break our TV., The toy with the bell smells awful! The blue ball doesn't make any sound, which is disappointing because it's too hard to be a chew toy so it basically does nothing. The bubbles are really sticky and gross. Would not recommend., My dog loves the babble balls.and although they don't last very long his pure delight when they arrive makes it worth it. When I saw this set I was excited thinking it would be a great value but the additional items were crap. The bubble dispenser is so small that the majority of the goo ended up on the floor, the rope toys lasted about 20 seconds and the newspaper toy was worthless. I will get the babble balls again because like I said my pooch loses his mind for them but the rest of the pack was a complete waste of money and my time picking up the remains SMH, The rope toys were flimsy. They frayed quickly. The plastic of the pickle was very thin and weak. The bell of the tire toy came out with limited use and the tires were quickly chewed apart. Disappointing.]

reviews: [Bought 2 of these to play tug with. One handle came off in normal play within the first 2 min. descriptions:

key_benefits: ['Perfect for tug of war games and fetch, too!', 'Unique toy makes a giggling sound when tugged—dogs love it!', 'Durable rope withstands pulling and chewing.', 'Rubber giggler connector is soft on teeth, great for pups who chew everything.', 'Big loops are easy to hold or loop around a doorknob for solo play.']
reviews: [Received this today. Thought it was cute. Pup likes it but after playing tug with her fir about 30 minutes - it’s shredding. Would like a refund., My dog LOVES this toy. However we are on our 3rd one and will not buy another. The stitching on the rope ends isn't strong enough to keep the ends together for more than a couple games of tug., My dog and her tug of war friends love this toy. Downside is the rings are not well stitched together and end up pulling apart fairly quickly. We've tried fixing it but doesn't really work. Also, the 2nd one I bought, the noise mechanism died even before the rings pulled apart. I have bought a 3rd just bc the dogs LOVE this toy. Just wish it was a little tougher made., It is a great toy, but don't leave it with a chewing lab pup unsupervised. She immediately chewed through one of the rings when I turned my back. Needless to say, it went into the garbage!]

reviews: [It took my 1 year old German Wirehair Pointer all of about 30 mins to totally dismantall this product. The ropes easily unbraid and then come apart. Leaving small pieces of rope everywhere., Out of the box the toy had a strong plastic smell and my puppy was not interested. After airing out for a few days she began to play with it. Within an hour she had all of the knots undone and all of the plastic rings off. I tried to retie it but the rope is so soft it won't hold a knot., I’m not too happy with this product my dog tore most of the twine out of it within five minutes it wasn’t very sturdy and didn’t last very long honestly this is something I could’ve probably made on my own. Not too thrilled with it I guess it depends on the kind of dog you have but he’s not a pretty big destroyer of stuff and this only lasted me a few minutes I’ve definitely had a lot better rope toys, My Great Pyranese had this tore up within 24 hours!, The puppy and I both love this toy. It’s the first thing she pulls out of the toy box. The rubber rings are fun to chew and strong enough to withstand a big puppy. The rest of the toy is knotted rope which is easy to untie and straighten out and then retie. Big knots! Strong tugging! I think this toy will hold her interest over time., I bought this in spite of reviews. My big dog loves to chew and jute rope is one of his favs. That's why it got 3 stars. It "tugs" well,easy on the hands. BUT this should be an "outside toy". This dog's a "shaker" and the first good shake one of the rubber rings flew off and ricocheted off the wall(could have been tv). As he's chewed it, small lengths of the rope are everywhere., This did not last 5 minutes with our 5 month old German Shepherd. She loved it right away but the the jute came apart almost immediately., My shorkie shredded it in about a week, but he shreds everything. It served its purpose I guess lol., This was very poor quality for the price. My dog loves puzzle toys but unraveled the rope as soon as I gave it to him before he could even try the puzzle. The rope shredded and I had to throw it away in the first 5 minutes. It should say for small dogs only., This rope toy looked & sounded better before I purchased it. It only lasted maybe ten minutes between my three dogs. It says that it's challenging for dogs to take off the rings, but that's not true. Not the best toy purchase. But it was an okay price.]

title: Nerf Dog Super Soaker Squeaker Tug Ray Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your energetic pal a durable toy optimized for extra-tough tossing, fetching, and tugging with the Nerf Dog Super Soaker Squeaker Tug Ray Dog Toy. It’s built with special materials to withstand hours of play like thermoplastic rubber and a nylon rope for hours of tugging fun. Your pal will love the squeaking sounds, enticing rope, and textured surface that’s sure to make playtime that much more exciting.  Plus, thanks to its aerodynamic shape, it’s the perfect toy for on-demand games of fetch indoors, at the park, or at your favorite spot.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. key_benefits: ['Built to stand up to extra tough play with thermoplastic rubber and nylon pull rope.', 'With squeakers inside for the noisy fun your pal loves and rope for tugging.', 'Aerodynamic shape makes it perfect for on demand games of fetch.', 'Textured surface adds variety and encourages play behaviors.', 'Fun shape is perfectly portable so you can take it to your pal’s favorite spot.']
reviews: [One of my dogs pulled out the rope the first time we used it. Otherwise might be a great water retrieval toy., My Shepard/Lab puppy LOVES this. He will drag it around, retrieve it and play tug. The rope is thinner and not very strong (so it will need replacing if we keep tugging with it)., This toy lasted almost eight months before it started to chip. I ran it through the dishwasher every week or so and my pup went from about 10 weeks to 10 months and a bit with this as one of her faves. She loved to chase it and to play tug of war with it. The squeaker died a few months ago, but her interest did not wane. I’d recommend this one, especially in a multi-dog household, because two can play with Ray at the same time., I was excited to bring this home to my pup because she loves squeaky toys. It looks durable, but looks can be deceiving. The first toss of the toy part of the squeaky fell out, and now there is no sound at all. When is a company going to make a squeaky toy that actually works for longer than 2 seconds? Don't buy, We love this toy. Great for our active border collie(s) and fun to fetch. It's soft and gummy, so no teeth damage, but also very durable & thick. They seem to really like the shape+ the squeaker. I like that it has a rope, to keep you cleaner when throwing & ideal for "flinging". :) And it flies nicely when u throw it., Keeps our pup running and even when we have visits from our grand doggie, they tug together! We purchased another one !, Dog's favorite toys are squeakers and ropes, and this is the only toy I've found that has both. It seems really well made and durable - dog loves it!!!, My 3 Rotties love this toy!!!! My older Rotties has taken to sleeping with it, My dog loves this as a throw and fetch toy! The squeaker adds to her delight.]

reviews: [The glowing plastic is cool looking and is fun for the dogs at dark. However, it needs to be a bit thicker to withstand rigorous play. He carries it around with him in the house and outside. He chews on the soft rubber rim, and carries it with the firm center. He got a back paw through an opening then it was hysterical watching him try to figure out why he couldn't pick it up without his hind leg moving forward also. Maybe he'll want to play catch with it sometime. But for now, it's HIS and who would argue with a Lab puppy that's adopted a toy?, This broke in the glowing section the first time it was thrown. The dog then chewed on it for less than 10 seconds and tore up the surrounding blue section in 2 different areas., When I received the part it look good and sturdy. when I'm playing with my dog the second time I threw the toy it cracked the plastic piece the middle try to glue it but did not work ended up throwing it away. My dog is a Goldendoodle she's very gentle on toys, First night out using the center plastic broke. Very poor quality! Would highly not recommend! Waste of money!, my 20 lb boston terrier had the outer ring ripped very quickly., This roller is wonderful! Strong well made and my dog loves it when it bounces across the yard! It's a keeper!, This is not a frisbee at all but I love it. I’ve been searching for a lightweight durable replacement for the frisbee with a hole in the middle but had no luck, nerf one was too heavy & a lighter version had a hole too big in the middle it’s get stuck on his head. Backyard isn’t massive so I prefer that you can roll/bounce this along the ground. Often the frisbee would go in the neighbors yard this still goes the length of the yard but on the ground. I’d recommend it. Haven’t tried the glow in the dark feature usually we play during the daylight hours., It was BROKE with in 5mins of dog playing with it., I got this toy in August 2017, I have a 1 year old 55 pound hound mix that can destroy a brand new tennis ball in under an hour. He is a power chewer if left alone with a toy after a long game of fetch, and he also loves to play tug of war. I'm a 195 pound 22 year old ex collegiate athlete I'm no slouch in the gym and when we play tug of war he can knock me off balance when he really pulls. All that being said this toy is awesome because we have used it at least 5 days out of every week since I got it and the thing is just as solid as the day we got it. This is a roller toy not a flyer, meaning its meant to be thrown like a wheel and rolled on the ground not thrown like a frisbee. If the toy ]

title: Jax and Bones Elton the Octopus Rope Dog Toy, Large
descriptions:

This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. reviews: [It is small but fits a puppy to play and chew. My puppy loves it!, My boxer is a TOUGH chewer and no toy seems to last him more than a week or two but he LOVES this octopus and he's had it for about a month. Will definitely be buying this again when he kills the old one, I just assumed it would be a normal size but its so small very cute though, My dog chewed this toy in minutes. I purchased this thinking it was going to last a while., It looked really cute and nice when it arrived but within one day one of the legs had completely unraveled. My frenchie puppy isn't an aggressive chewer he mostly just throws his toys around so I would not recommend. I've had other rope toys that he's played with for over a month that are still pristine. Big disappointment., I bought this for my tiny morkie puppy. Within 20 minutes the legs are undone. This toy is great for supervised play but will be eaten in hours, It is smaller than I expected but still a good toy, definitely not for power teething puppies! Mine is now a ball of rope haha!, I love this toy and so do my dogs! Both my 65lb boxer and my 9lb min pin love this little octopus!! Neither of them try and chew it (they dont like chewing on rope) so it's in perfect shape, but they both love to fetch it and carry it around with them places! So cute!!, Smaller than what I thought but quite durable and adorable~, The first review on this item is pretty accurate.The octopus is very small, about the size I would give to a 20 lb dog, so that was a little disappointing. However the quality of the toy is great. If you are looking for a similar item that is much more worth the price, the Jax and Bones large Seal or jumbo Elephant is the way to go. It's disappointing this "large" item is so much smaller compared to the other larges. Chewy isn't to blame, the Jax and Bones tag has the item labeled as large when in my opinion it definitely should be a small. Have to pay more attention to the dimensions listed next time!]

reviews: [The first one I bought, my really tough, tough chewer destroyed half of it. Then he started carrying around with him everywhere. He had torn what little stuffing there was in there completely out and had chewed the squeaker up. He loved it so much he never finished destroying the other end. I have 2 Standard Poodles. They don’t get many toys because this tough man not only chews all of up but he eats it all, too. So my other boy just quit playing with them. I still buy 2 of everything. So after he loved that raggedy thing, I bought 2 more. Not one bit of destruction!! I guess he loves I so much he decided to keep this one in good shape. We are huge Bama fans. I’m so sad you have no more Bama, Got this for my Collie because she likes to play tug. Unfortunately, after 3 days of playing with it, the stuffing is gone as is 1/2 the toy. Our Doxie can pull on it and not tear it., My 1 year old, 25 pound Puggle had a hole in this within 5 minutes. Definitely not the quality of a Kong pull. Typical Browns fashion. Lol., The puppies play with this sometimes, but it's not their favorite. They do like to play tug of war with it and each other., My 2 great danes love this toy. descriptions:

reviews: [I have a 1.5 yr old Treeing Walker Coonhound. There is no doubt she is a super chewer. I went to this website to see if there were any tough toys to outlast my pup. The average was less than 1 day per toy. I am very disappointed with this product and think Chewy should "REMOVE" this product from their super chewer catagory. The tag is misleading. After spending over $60 on toys for my dog to have it destroyed so quickly is ridiculous, Admittedly I have a chewer, but this dog toy started with our dog 5/1 in the mid afternoon. By the evening my 32 lbs 8 month old puppy had pulled the squeaker out of the head and chewed partially chewed through the hemp rope. By the early evening (~ 7:30 PM) it looked like the photo. While I'm not surprised that he got through the plush parts fairly quickly I expected a much longer life from the hemp rope, This toy lasted less than 5 minutes with my pups. The rope literally shredded in about three minutes. Not worth the money!, Hard to believe that this was referred to as a "Tough" toy. It didn't even survive more than 10 minutes before the head and tail were removed. The whole thing is going in the garbage now as even the rope is in shreds., I thought the rope would provide a durable toy for my chewer but it lasted only about 30 minutes. On top of that as he shredded the rope, hemp fibers spread everywhere. Had higher hopes for this., Our 6 month old puppy ripped the tail off in less than 5 minutes, and he's not an aggressive player. Had high hopes for this eco friendly toy but sadly it is not of a good quality., My Yorkie ripped this to shreds in 30 seconds. I thought it might last a little longer., My dogs love it. They carry it everywhere and it lasts doesn’t fall apart., Unfortunately Walker had his head gone in the first day., We are always looking for non-toxic toys for our pup and the shelter. This seems to be that. Unfortunately, our angel had the - sort of - tennis balls out in not time. I think it's still usable as long as the head is intact, but would not recommend for shelter donations.]

title: Jax and Bones Sidney the Seal Rope Dog Toy, Small
descriptions:
["Give your dog a toy you can trust with the naturally entertaining and non-toxic Jax and Bones Sidney the Seal Rope Toy. This eco-friendly and chemical-free toy is knotted by hand and colored using only the highest quality, vegetable-based dyes. Since it’s made of all rope, it will naturally fray and unravel—but don’t fret, as the texture acts like doggy dental floss to help keep teeth clean. Plus, it’s 100% biodegradable so you can toss it into the compost pile when he’s had all the fun. It's great for a game of toss and fetch and you can even soak it in water and freeze it for an extra cool toy during the hot summer months, or for teething puppies.", 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

                        See all items by Jax and Bones
']
key_benefits: ['Made from 100% eco-friendly, chemical-free and non-toxic cotton thread using all-natural vegetable dyes, so your dog can play safely.', 'Hand-tied for maximum strength and durability during play, allowing parts to be easily removed when major fraying occurs.', 'Knotted texture acts as doggie dental floss to help clean teeth.', '100% machine-washable so it’s easy to keep fresh for your pup.', 'Can be dipped in water and frozen to safely cool down your dog or to help quickly soothe a teething puppy’s sore gums.']
reviews: [We play hall fetch every morning (we've got almost 70 feet of hallway) the wonderful rope toys we've been buying for years are no longer available. So I saw this and thought, okay safe vegetable dyes so let's try one. Luckily it was kinda pricey so I only ordered one as a tester. Well in under 3 minutes both flippers started to unravel. Once they came apart enough I tied the ends into knots, so we'll see how long this floppy flippered seal lasts. Betting nowhere near as long as the white 9 inch rope toys at almost half the price. Kinda disappointed in this product so far., Got this for my pup when he was teething and it helped for a bit then he destroyed it in minutes. It’s been hard to find anything that won’t be in pieces. I would of love this if it wasn’t for that., My lab tore through this within minutes. It is very cute but the rope isn't tied up very tight so she unraveled it quickly and I had to take it away as she started pulling pieces off. Disappointed because its a bit pricey. She has other rope toys that lasted much longer, Our 9 week old Lab loves this toy..and with those teeth it is a wonder he is still functioning...but he is., My dog is a chewer and makes quick work of most soft toys. She is really enjoying the multiple ropes that come together to make this toy and the challenge of destroying each one! Although she is destroying it, I am pleased with the amount of time it's lasted and her continued interest. I would definitely buy this or something similar again., My dog is small but is a big chewer. He often destroys toys quickly and I hate the idea of sending so many dog toys to the landfill. I tried giving him recyclable chew toys but he doesn't seem to like the rubbery texture and prefers fabric toys. Since the description for this toy said it is compostable I thought to give it a try and so far it's a winner! It might not be the most durable (my dog was able to get some edges to start fraying the first day he got it) but no toy is indestructible anyway and I feel better knowing that this toy can eventually go into the compost bin rather than the garbage. Also, even though there is some fraying I just trim the loose ends with scissors and he can keep, I googled tough pet toys for chewing dogs and this came up first. My dog had it chewed open in 10 minutes and had stuffing pulled out shortly thereafter. She loves to play fetch with it and I recommend it for anyone who's dog doesn't eat every toy she gets.]

descriptions:

Simply add water to turn this bowling pin into a weighted dog toy and adjust the amount of water until it's the perfect weight for your pup. You can even fill the Shake-N-Fetch Bowling Pin with rocks or sand for an enticing sound. Best of all, it can float, which means it’s paws-tively perfect for the beach, lake or pool. key_benefits: ['Made with high-density polythelene for a durable design, plus it provides your pal with hours of fun and exercise.', 'The weight of the toy can be adjusted by adding or reducing the amount of water you put in the pin.', 'The Shake-N-Fetch Bowling Pin design makes it easy for your pup to pick up.', "Easily floats, so it's the perfect toy to bring with you to the pool, lake or beach.", 'The toy can also be filled with sand or rocks to add an enticing sound that your furry friend will love.']
reviews: [My pups got this toy from a friend as Christmas gift... they were not too sure about it ... not great interest until 6 months later when we decided to throw it in the pool! Oh boy why haven’t I done this earlier! They love it .... I’m buying a second one because they both want to play with it at the same time!, My rambunctious 2 yr old chocolate lab LOVES this floating toy, and self-plays with it at the lake, whether repeatedly pushing it off the dock to dive in after, or tussling with it in shallow water. You can adjust its wobble factor by increasing the amount of water you put inside. Incredibly durable, even this mega chewer hasn't destroyed it at all. Best purchase for my Bo!, My girl wasn’t interested in this, when I finally got her to interact with this toy, within less then a minute she walked away as if saying. . .ho hum, boring toy mom. So, I’ll add it to the donation box. For those who may be interested in trying this toy. . .the water does not leak out, as a matter of fact if you need or want to drain the water out, it requires a little effort.]

descriptions:

Perfect for tug of war, fetch games, carrying and spirited solo play, this toy has pretty much everything your furry buddy could ever want. key_benefits: ['Durable braided rope toy has two knots that are great for chewing.', 'Rope toys help promote oral health by massaging teeth and gums.', 'Encourages natural chewing instincts in dogs.', 'Squeaker inside makes it great for playtime, too.', 'In two sizes to fit pups large and small.']
reviews: [This toy looks like a rope but it's really just braided string that easily unravels at the end. My pup is a light chewer and within a few days had all the string unbraided down to the knots and the strings are easily pulled out so the dog can eat them. You'd think they'd seal or sew the rope at the ends so it doesn't fray so easily., My dog loves interactive play, and this toy is it. It’s fairly tough, with tight braiding being the main fabric component, which is then knotted. A squeaky ball is encased within the fabric, so he can squeak it, but not chew it out (yet!!). He’s had it for a few days, he shoves it in my face or lap, I grab an end, and we play tug o war, or I throw it for him. He loves sitting down and squeaking it for awhile too, and so far, so good, no exterior damage! I don’t expect any toy to last more than a week with him because he’s a tough chewer - Mastiff - Rottweiler mix, but I have high hopes for this. I don’t leave ANY rope toys or things that can be destroyed, out when I’m not home. Peanut , My dog love the squeaky ball in the middle and carried this with him everywhere for days until the ball finally fell out. Now he carries the ball everywhere. Needless to say my dog loves squeaky things!]

title: Rogz Lighthouse Dog Toy, Large
descriptions:
['If your pup was born to swim, this toy is the perfect match for him! Its incredible buoyancy helps it stand up in the water and makes it easy to spot as it bobs in rough surf. The contrasting red and white stripes are specially visible to dogs and makes it easier for them to fetch their toy in any type of water conditions. This toy also has a cord that makes it a breeze to throw far, even for kids!\xa0', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. ']
key_benefits: ['Its incredible buoyancy helps it stand up in the water and makes it easy to spot as it bobs in rough surf', 'The contrasting red and white stripes are specially visible to dogs and makes it easier for them to fetch their toy in any type of water conditions', 'Safe and comfortable on your dog’s teeth and gums', 'Floats and stands up just like a lighthouse and can be used either in the water or outdoors', 'Includes a cord that makes it a breeze to throw far, even for kids!\xa0']
reviews: [Bought this toy for dock diving practice. It floats, is brightly colored, durable, and nicely sized. This is not intended to be a chew toy! Its great for its intention - fetch in the water., I bought this Lighthouse for my new Newfoundland to retrieve in both fresh and saltwater. It is our favorite water toy! We have used this about 10 times this past summer and it's in perfect condition. The lighthouse floats upright in both salt and freshwater making it very easy for her to locate above the waves., I would give this toy 0 stars if it was an option for a variety of reasons. Its way to expensive to only last for five minutes before it broke. My Labradoodle loves to swim and retrieve anything I throw in the water for him. I thought this thing would float vertically but definitely did not in the saltwater. The third time I threw it for him the top of the lighthouse broke off from the weighted base and upon further inspection it looked as if the two were attached using low quality elmers glue. One would think at this price point you would be receiving a quality product, unfortunately that was not the case., Best water toy, well, other than tennis balls. My Standard Schnauzer loves swimming for this toy. What's really funny is that it was not tested in a salt water pool. The base needs to be slightly heavier. However, when it lays flat on the water it's easier for my dog to retrieve., Definitely a hit with our pup. The other dogs always steal it from him too! Easy to see because it pops right up out of the water. Highly recommended!, The light house dog toy fell apart after one use.I'm trying another one hope it works as it is a perfect toy for the water, this toy came apart within 15 minutes of play. seemed dry rotted., Our Portuguese Water Dog puppy LOVES this toy. The string came off right away, but the toy still works so well! She loves to carry it to the lake herself, and she will run in from shore or leap off the dock to retrieve it. It always pops up right away. Easy for us to spot, easy for her to see and grab. Just the right size for her (she's around 55 lbs)., My dog destroyed this in 10 min... too bad it was a super cute toy!, Used this out at the beach. My dog isn't a chewer of toys he retrieves. This one split in half under 30 tosses. Bummer, it floated so nice and was a good highly visible toy.]

title: FUZZU Grab Nabbers Earl the Squirrel Squeaker Dog Toy
descriptions:

reviews: [This toy does NOT light up like it is supposed to! What a disappointment and waste of money... I bought this toy for my pup to have a toy to play with at night time seems we have a big back yard and this way we could see it. We also bought the ball and same thing it didn’t light up and the one side piece came off after he went and fetched it 3 times.... don’t waste your money on this product at all!!!, Lasted about 10 minutes iwth my 6 month lab, she played and had fun and then torn a chunk out of the black material., Held up pretty good with my dog chewing it. title: Fetch Pet Products RopeBots Squeaky Rop Dog Toys, 2-Pack
descriptions:
['Get ready to party with Fetch Pet Products RopeBots 2-Pack Bundle Dog Toys. Love rope? Love squeakers? These toys have it all! With tightly woven, reinforced canvas exteriors, and soft, squeaky interiors, these toys are sure to keep Fido engaged and happy! A unique, double-stitched canvas encases the squeakers, creating a unique texture for curious pup. Plus, these pawsome toys are tested thoroughly to ensure quality and safety for those moderate chewers and tuggers—aggressive chewers, this one may not be for you! Interactive play can help end boredom and strengthen the unbreakable bond between you and your dog, so what are you waiting for? Get to the paw-ty.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.', '

']
key_benefits: ['This super fun toy comes with a regular squeaker and one large "honk" squeaker, for all the loud and rowdy play your pup loves.', 'Double-stitched canvas encases squeakers while durable rope legs and arms extend from the bottom, creating variating textures for curious pup.', 'Tested thoroughly to ensure quality and safety for moderate chewers and tuggers—aggressive chewers, beware.', 'Playing together can help end boredom and strengthen the bond between you and your pup!', 'Super pack comes with 2 toys, for double the fun!']
reviews: [Shylo is rough on most toys although she has a few she won't tear up these are among the privileged. I'm happy because they are ADORABLE., I have a pandora charm just like these! And my puppy loves them! Did I mention they're so cute?!? The squeakers are more of an oink lol, These two little rope robots are so cute! I did however only get one out of the two. The yellow one and he is a hit with my dogs!, These are cute but the neck is fragile and tore easily. Also, doesn't have a good squeaker.]

title: Outward Hound Naturals Ropeez Dog Toy, Rope N Rings
descriptions:
['Show your furry friend some fun with a plaything that is also earth friendly with the Outward Hound Naturals Ropeez Dog Toy. It is made of natural materials like hemp, rubber, jute and coconut husk stuffing instead of synthetic polyfill. Ideal for those pups that love to tug and problem solve, this rope has natural textures and scents to engage your sidekick even more. The crepe and rubber texture also massage the gums of your paw-tner and aid in dental health. Designed for gentle chewers, Outward Hound Naturals Ropeez Dog Toy is as pet-friendly as it is eco-friendly.', '

                        See all items by Outward Hound
']
key_benefits: ['Fun rope toy made of natural materials your pup will love.', 'Features hemp, rubber, jute and coconut husk stuffing instead of synthetic polyfill.', 'Massages the gums of your paw-tner and aids in dental health with crepe and rubber.', 'Natural textures and scents will engage your furry friend.', 'Comes in different shapes to match the spirit of your sidekick.']
reviews: [My dog loves this toy because she use to chew on our outside table and so this is perfect for her!, I felt like it was not a safe toy as the rope came apart, Not for dogs that chew a lot. Lasted about 5-10 minutes., I'm pretty happy with this toy so far. My GSD has only undone one of the knots so far (it's been about a week). He just kind of totes this around and tosses it. We also play fetch with it. He could probably easily chew it up, but he hasn't done so yet. Knowing him, he will dismantle the rope before chewing the plastic/rubber part., Not a very good toy for a BIG dog. Rope comes apart very easy, and can be swallowed, if not supervised., My pup loved this right away. Unfortunately, it didn't last too long., Lasted my 32lb Aussie about 30 second. I have dish sponges more durable., My dog enjoyed the 2 different textures but it was in pieces in about 3 days. She isn't even really a big chewer and didn't play with it much more than an hour total. Wish it had been tougher., Not what I expected from an Outward Hound toy. My dog loved it, but chewed it to pieces in no time.]

title: Tuffy's Mega Tug Oval Squeaky Plush Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Tuffy's Mega Tug Oval Dog Toy is ideal for interactive play with one or multiple giant breed dogs. It’s made with three layers of safe, non-toxic fibers: soft fleece, industrial grade luggage material, and plastic coating. All three are fused and sewn together to make one ultra "tuff" layer, ensuring this toy is just as durable as it is fun. It also has a protective pouch around each of its squeakers as an added safety measure in the event your dog gets to the core. This toy is great for indoor use because of its soft exterior, perfect for outdoor use because it floats in water, and easy to clean because it’s machine washable.', "The Tuffy's Series Toys are designed to be play toys and not chew toys. Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. Supervised play will help toys last longer and most importantly keep your pal safe. No dog toy is truly indestructible, so always remove the toy from playtime if pieces begin to break off.", "

                        See all items by Tuffy's
"]
key_benefits: ['Assembled with multiple seams and webbing to make this toy a worthy opponent for most moderate chewers.', 'Made with 3 uniquely fused layers for added durability during play.', 'Squeakers are sewn into a pouch for safe-keeping, allowing an extra layer of protection.', 'Floats in water for added fun and machine washable for easy cleaning.', 'Ideal for large and giant breed dogs.']
reviews: [I have two large terriers and this toy is perfect for them to grasp when playing each other. Also, super tough material. Can't beat an aggressive chewer but definitely can hold its own., My dog, Bella, medium size (50lbs) chewed it up in about 15-20 minutes, was hoping it would stand up but did not last!, My puppies love all this toy. It’s still standing strong !!!!!, Toy was very tuff and just what they needed. They loved their present when they opened it., It’s the biggest tug toy I’ve ever seen but my dog loves it. It’s really durable!, This toy has really held up! I was worried about spending almost $25 for a toy, but the only thing our pooch has managed to do is stop the squeakers from squeaking. He hasn’t gotten through any of the fabric or seams yet and it’s been a month. Most toys we get him are destined to be destroyed in days, most of the hours or minutes. I am impressed!!, Dog enjoyed playing tug with it until she was left alone for a couple of minutes and chewed a hole in it and ripped out all the stuffing, not tough at all, destroyed in less than a week., Had the smaller version for my Shi Tzu and bought this for my friends Bull Mastiff who has just about chewed up everything else he had. He chews up wood. Anyway this product is very durable and tuff and well made. So far so good, has not destroyed it., They usually love to play tug of war but they didn’t like this one at all. It’s really hard for them to grab it not worth getting., My Charlie can chew through any toy in a matter of minutes.. this toy we've had for over a month.. the squeaker is pretty pathetic sounding now but he's only torn through one seam and the toy is still mostly intact. Definitely a great buy for us.. to be fair, Charlie seems to revere this toy more than others and enjoys trotting around with it in his mouth and shaking it more than chewing on it. We've played tug of war many times with him and it has held up well!]

title: Doggles Pentapulls Flying Squirrel Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Give your energetic pal a toy designed to stand up to extra-tough playtime with the Doggles Pentapulls Flying Squirrel Dog Toy. Its patented "X" design and super-stitched construction makes it perfect for extra-strength pulling, shaking, and tugging in any direction. Because it’s built completely out of one solid piece with flat embroidery and no attachment points, there are no toy parts that can be torn off by even the most energetic roughhousing! Thanks to its four layers of recycled ballistic nylon that resists tears and abrasions, it’s perfect for pups who love to rough-and-tumble. Plus, the tail and legs squeak when pressed, for the loud squeaking fun your pup loves. It’s lightweight enough to be easily tossed for a quick game of fetch with your furry friend, and cuddly for those more laid-back moments.', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.

title: Fetch Pet Products RopeBots Yellow Squeaky Rope Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Get ready to party with Fetch Pet Products RopeBots Yellow Dog Toy.  Love rope? Love squeakers? This toy has it all! With a tightly woven, reinforced canvas exterior, and a soft, squeaky interior, this toy is sure to keep Fido engaged and happy! A unique, double-stitched canvas encases the squeakers, creating a unique texture for curious pup. Plus, this pawsome toy is tested thoroughly to ensure quality and safety for those moderate chewers and tuggers—aggressive chewers, this one may not be for you! Interactive play can help end boredom and strengthen the unbreakable bond between you and your dog, so what are you waiting for? Get to the paw-ty.', 'Every dog plays differently and, since not all toys are created equal, it’s always best to keep a close watch on your pup in case things get ruff. reviews: [really cute but my 7 1/2 month old golden doodle destroyed it in 5 minutes. misleading description states for moderate chewers, I like the grunt squeaker in the body. It's not an annoying high-pitched sound like other toys. My dogs love it and the ropes help keep teeth clean. The elastic neck makes it a good tug toy too. We also have the purple one. I love the heart!, its cute but smaller than i expected and the rope is just sewn to the fabric. might have been tougher if the rope pieces were connected to each other., My puppy loves to chew and play with this toy. It seems flimsy but is holding up to a lot of tugging play and chewing. Easy for puppy to carry]

reviews: [The tug is colorful and makes a great crinkle noise that keeps the pup interested. But when my older dog played, the tennis ball was shattered in minutes. They still play with the rope., I received a blue version of this item. A bit disappointed as I did want the color as pictured on the website., I just got package today and play tug ball to my dogs , seems they like it so I let them tug each other. Later on I come see tug ball. I couldn't believe my eyes what I see that tennis ball rip off in half and tiny little pieces, I'm so disappointed that tug toy I was looking for then went bad less than a day , not recommended if your dog chewer, Yorkie poos destroyed the ball within seconds. We had to remove the ball and kept the rope., The rope part of this toy seems sturdy enough and we will continue to let our dog play with the rope. However, the tennis ball was not well made and broke apart after about 30 min of play. I had to get it away from my dog because it started to disintegrate into small pieces. I would recommend using a rubber ball instead like some of the other tug of war toys., I thought this product would be great and keep my Maci entertained. However that really was not the case, she chewed the ball off right away, and the rope lasted maybe a few hours. We have knotted ropes that have been around a few years. I was disappointed., the ball ripped apart in less than a minute. we have had the rope for about 2 weeks but the crinkling material started to come out after a week., Our 1-1/2 year old Rhodesian ridgeback/lab chewed up the ball. I had to cut it off so he wouldn't swallow the pieces., My dog loves to chew and he picked at this one for a few hours and now there are pieces of neon colored string scattered throughout my apartment, Doggie really enjoys this toy and so do we! My pup is 5.5 months old and teething so he loves pressure on his jaw. We grab the Handle and he grabs the ball side and we can play tug of war with him for a while, until we get tired lol. It gets energy out and he loves it.]

descriptions:

reviews: [Perfect for tug or chewing. Keeps puppy busy. Only thing to watch is the ends of the rope shred easily, so it's not a toy I can leave alone with my puppy., My American Staffordshire Terrior loves this toy however, since he is a bullly breed, the antler part only lasted a day. All gone after just an afternoon of intermittent chewing. We still have the rope part and it is showing wear rapidly. For a breed with less bite it probably would last much longer. Still a great toy but pricy for a heavy chewer., Got this for our Pitty. Read reviews with other Pit owners and they loved it. I liked it, but he chewed the rope apart way too easily. I think I will just get him antler chews and forgo the rope. plus I'll get more antler for my buck!, Both my pitbull have their own & love them so much. By far their favorite rope chew toy. The Elk antlers are very durable and they last forever. I have a feeling the rope would have been destroyed a long time ago if the antler wasn't so appealing and time consuming. I like that I don't have to closely supervise them while chewing on these, because I don't have to worry about pieces breaking off. Even powerful pit bull jaws aren't able to crack these antlers, so it promotes consistent gnawing to whittle them down. Worth every penny because they last a very long time. Also I like that they are a natural source of essential minerals and don't cause digestive issues!, I have a 7-month old German shepherd puppy and we go through toys like they're nothing. I bought this toy because he has another rope/bone combo which he LOVES, and this one is no different. He keeps himself entertained by tossing the rope around and then running to catch it. The antler keeps his mouth busy for hours and he never gets bored with it. I highly recommend this!]

title: Frisco Ballistic Nylon Plush with Rope Squeaky Astronaut Dog Toy
descriptions:
['This toy is one small step for pups and one giant leap for interactive fun! This toy is perfect for your little explorer of the stars when they’re in play mode. It’s smooth ballistic nylon to keep playtime going and lots of squishy stuffing with a rope toy attached to the back. So, no matter how your pup wants to play—fetch, catch or tug—this toy is up for it. Blast off into fun with this toy from Frisco!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Frisco
']
key_benefits: ['Plush astronaut toy is made for you and your pup to have some out of this world fun.', 'Covered in ballistic nylon with astronaut suit accents, lots of squishy stuffing and an attached rope toy on the back.', 'Includes a squeaker stuffed inside the astronaut’s head and body so your dog can have lots of loud playtime and stay interested.', 'Great for fetching and catching when your dog is in playmode, with lots of erratic, bouncy action.', 'Made to bring some extraterrestrial cuteness to your dog’s toy collection.']
reviews: [My dog is a tough chewer, so the material for this toy is great. The Nylon lasts longer than most plush toys. I also love that a rope is included with this astronaut so I can play with him too. I love that Frisco came out with a space line. I love anything having to do with space so this was a must for my little alien pup. Overall, my pup and I love this toy. #chewyteamrated, Do I have to give this to my dog?! This is too cool. I love it has the rope attached that way I can tug o war with my pup to see who gets to keep it. :) #ChewyTeamRated]

title: Frisco Retro Plush with Rope Squeaky Comic Book Bubble Dog Toy
descriptions:
['This toy gives your dog the best of a rope toy and a plush toy with the classic look of a comic book! If you’ve got a furry fan at home who needs to add to their retro collection, this rope toy with three individual plush toys attached is perfect. It’s great for interactive games that help you bond, and it’s easy on your dog’s teeth and gums while they’re in playmode. Feel the flashback nostalgia with Frisco!', '
                No toy is indestructible. Supervise your pet when using since small parts can present a choking hazard or internal blockage. Discontinue use if the toy is damaged. Keep out of reach of children.
', '

                        See all items by Frisco
']
key_benefits: ['Rope toy designed with three attached, comic book-themed plush toys.', 'Classic, cotton rope with bright, eye-catching colors is great for interactive games between you and your pup.', 'Three, comic book-themed exclamation bubbles with plush covers attached to the rope toy.', 'Each plush toy has a soft cover, squishy stuffing inside and a squeaker too.', 'Adds some throwback fun to your dog’s toy box.']
reviews: [This colorful and retro look is very fun! The colors are cute and bold. This rope toy is great for play time because of the squeaky plush bubbles and it's very fun to play tug of war with! #chewyteamrated, First the comic bubble theme is so fun! But the squeaker combined with the rope tug is very exciting for my pups! Love the toy #ChewyTeamRated]

title: Buckle-Down Spider-Man Squeaky Tug Dog Toy
descriptions:
['Your furry friend will be ready to fight crime with this Spider-Man Tug Dog Toy from Buckle-Down. This toy features the famous web-slinger and is made of high-density polyester. It is filled with quality poly-fill and also includes a squeaker to keep your paw-tner occupied. The woven handle makes this toy ideal for tug-of-war so keep your little superhero active with the Buckle-Down Spider-Man Tug Dog Toy.', '

                        See all items by Buckle-Down
']
key_benefits: ['Tug toy featuring Spider-Man on both sides.', 'Made of durable, high-density polyester with a woven handle for tug-of-war.', 'Features a squeaker on the inside to keep your furry friend occupied.', 'Measures 9 inches in length with an additional 6-inch loop.', 'Officially Licensed Marvel Comics Product.']
